verse.content: Mfitiaseɛ no Onyankopɔn bɔɔ ɔsoro ne asase.
Na asase da hɔ hunu a ɛnni bɔbea biara, na esum wɔ ebunu no ani. Na Onyankopɔn honhom butu
nsuo no ani.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ hann! Na ɛyɛɛ hann.
Na Onyankopɔn hunuu hann no sɛ ɛyɛ. Na Onyankopɔn paee hann ne esum no mu.
Na ɔfrɛɛ hann no sɛ adekyee, ne esum no adesae. Na adeɛ sae, na adeɛ kyee, da a ɛdi kan ne no.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Ewiem mmra, na ɛmmɛpae nsuo no mu.
Na Onyankopɔn yɛɛ ahunumu ntrɛmu. Na ɔpaee nsuo a ɛwɔ ewiem no aseɛ ne deɛ ɛwɔ ewiem no soɔ no mu. Na ɛyɛɛ saa.
Na Onyankopɔn frɛɛ ewiem no ɔsoro. Na adeɛ sae, na adeɛ kyee, da a ɛtɔ so mmienu ne no.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Nsuo a ɛwɔ ɔsoro aseɛ no mmoaboa ano wɔ faako, na wɔnhunu asase pɛsɛɛ. Na ɛyɛɛ saa.
Na Onyankopɔn frɛɛ pɛsɛɛ no asase, na nsuo mmoano no, ɔfrɛɛ no ɛpo. Na Onyankopɔn hunuu sɛ ɛyɛ.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Asase mfifiri nwira, mfudeɛ, nnuaba sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ wɔ asase so. Na ɛyɛɛ saa.
Na asase fifirii nwira ne nnuaba sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ. Na Onyankopɔn hunuu sɛ ɛyɛ.
Na adeɛ sae, na adeɛ kyee, da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa ne no.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Nkanea mmra ewiem, na ɛmmɛpae awia ne anadwo mu, na ɛnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ mma mmerɛ, nna ne mfeɛ nkyekyɛmu.
Bio, na ɛnyɛ nkanea wɔ ewiem, na ɛnhyerɛn wɔ asase so. Na ɛyɛɛ saa.
Na Onyankopɔn yɛɛ nkanea akɛseɛ mmienu no, sɛ kɛseɛ no nni adekyeeɛ so, na ketewa no, sɛ ɛnni anadwo so. Ɔyɛɛ nsoromma nso.
Na Onyankopɔn de sisii ewiem sɛ ɛnhyerɛn wɔ asase so,
na ɛnni adekyeeɛ ne adesaeɛ so, na ɛmpae hann ne esum no mu. Na Onyankopɔn hunuu sɛ ɛyɛ.
Na adeɛ sae, na adeɛ kyee, da a ɛtɔ so nnan ne no.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Nsuo no nnɔre abɔdeɛ a ɛte aseɛ pii, na ntakraboa ntu mfa asase so wɔ ewiem.
Na Onyankopɔn bɔɔ nsuboa akɛseɛ ne nketewa ahodoɔ sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ; ne ntakraboa nyinaa sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ. Na Onyankopɔn hunuu sɛ ɛyɛ.
Na Onyankopɔn hyiraa wɔn sɛ: Monwo, na monnɔ, na monyɛ ɛpo mu ma, na ntakraboa nnɔɔso asase so.
Na adeɛ sae, na adeɛ kyee, da a ɛtɔ so nnum ne no.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Abɔdeɛ a ɛtete aseɛ mfiri asase mu mmra, sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ: Ntɔteboa a ɛwɔ fie ne wiram ne mmoa a wɔwea ne asase so mmoadoma, sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ. Na ɛyɛɛ saa.
Na Onyankopɔn yɛɛ asase so mmoadoma, ntɔteboa ne mmoa a wɔwea fam nyinaa sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ. Na Onyankopɔn hunuu sɛ ɛyɛ.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Momma yɛnyɛ onipa wɔ yɛn suban so sɛ yɛn nsɛsoɔ, na wɔnni ɛpo mu mpataa, ewiem nnomaa, ntɔteboa, ne mmoa a wɔwea asase so nyinaa so.

block_quote.content: Na Onyankopɔn bɔɔ onipa wɔ ne suban so.
Aane, Nyankopɔn suban so na ɔbɔɔ no,
ɔbarima ne ɔbaa na ɔbɔɔ wɔn.

verse.content: Na Onyankopɔn hyiraa wɔn, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monwo, na monnɔre, na monyɛ asase so ma, na monya so tumi; na monni ɛpo mu mpataa ne ewiem nnomaa ne mmoa a wɔwɔ asase soɔ nyinaa so.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Hwɛ, mede mfudeɛ a ɛwɔ asase ani nyinaa ne nnuaba nyinaa mama mo sɛ ɛnyɛ mo aduane.
Na asase so mmoadoma nyinaa ne ewiem nnomaa nyinaa ne mmoa a wɔwea asase soɔ nyinaa, mede nhahan mono mama wɔn sɛ wɔnni. Na ɛyɛɛ saa.
Na Onyankopɔn hunuu deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa, na hwɛ, ɛyɛ pa ara. Na adeɛ sae, na adeɛ kyee, da a ɛtɔ so nsia ne no.

note.content: Mfonini a Hebri no retwa no te sɛ akokɔbaatan a ɔbutu ne nkosua so rehwɛ sɛ ɛbɛdane mma.

verse.content: Na wɔwiee ɔsoro ne asase ne deɛ ɛwɔ mu nyinaa bɔ.
Na da a ɛtɔ so nson no, na Onyankopɔn awie n’adwuma a ɔyɛeɛ no, na da a ɛtɔ so nson no, ɔhome firii n’adwuma a ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ho.
Na Onyankopɔn hyiraa da a ɛtɔ so nson no so, na ɔtee ho, ɛfiri sɛ ɛno mu na ɔhome firii n’adwuma a ɔyɛeɛ wɔ adebɔ mu no nyinaa ho.
Yei ne sɛdeɛ AWURADE Nyankopɔn bɔɔ ɔsoro ne asase.
Na afuo mu nnua nyinaa nnya mmaa asase so, na afuo mu nhahan nyinaa nnya mfifirii, ɛfiri sɛ na AWURADE Nyankopɔn nnya ntɔɔ nsuo nguu asase no so, na na onipa a ɔbɛdɔ asase nni hɔ.
Na nsuo firi asase so foroe, na ɛfɔɔ asase ani nyinaa.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn de fam dɔteɛ nwonoo onipa, na ɔhuu nkwa home guu ne hwene mu, na onipa yɛɛ ɔkra teasefoɔ.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn yɛɛ turo bi wɔ Eden a ɛwɔ apueeɛ fam, na ɔde onipa a ɔnwonoo no no tenaa hɔ.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn maa nnua ahodoɔ nyinaa a wɔhwɛ a, ɛyɛ fɛ, na ɛyɛ sɛ wɔdie asase no so, ne nkwa dua a ɛsi turo no mfimfini, ne papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua fifirii asase no so.
Na asuo bi tene firi Eden bɛfɔ turo no, na ɛfiri hɔ ara na emu paapae yɛɛ nsutire nnan.
Deɛ ɛdi kan no din de Pison, ɛno na ɛkonton twa Hawila asase a sika wɔ soɔ no nyinaa ho hyiae.
Na asase no so sika yɛ papa. Ɛhɔ na bedola aduhwam ne apopobibireboɔ wɔ.
Na asuo a ɛtɔ so mmienu no din de Gihon. Ɛno na ɛkonton twa Kus
asase nyinaa ho hyia.
Na asuo a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no ne Tigri,
ɛno na ɛsene wɔ Asiria apueeɛ. Na asuo a ɛtɔ so nnan ne Eufrate.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn de onipa no kɔtenaa Eden turom sɛ ɔnnɔ na ɔnwɛn hɔ.
Na ɔhyɛɛ onipa no sɛ: Turom ha nnua nyinaa, di bi.
Na mmom papa ne bɔne ho nimdeɛ dua no deɛ, nni; ɛfiri sɛ da a wobɛdi bie no, wuo na wobɛwuo.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ sɛ onipa nko tena; mɛyɛ ne nsɛsoɔ boafoɔ mama no.

Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn de dɔteɛ nwonoo wiram mmoadoma, ne ewiem nnomaa nyinaa, na ɔde wɔn baa onipa no nkyɛn sɛ ɔbɛhunu sɛdeɛ ɔbɛfrɛ wɔn. Na deɛ onipa de frɛɛ abɔdeɛ a ɛte aseɛ biara no, ɛno ara ne ne din.
Na onipa totoo afiemmoa, ewiem nnomaa ne wiram mmoadoma nyinaa din. Nanso onipa deɛ wɔannya ne boafoɔ a ɔfata amma no.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn maa nnahɔɔ tɔɔ onipa no so, na ɔdae. Na ɔyii ne mfe mpadeɛ mu baako, na ɔde nam tuaa ananmu.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn de mpadeɛ a ɔyi firii onipa no mu no yɛɛ ɔbaa, na ɔde no brɛɛ onipa no.
Na onipa no kaa sɛ:

block_quote.content: Ampa ara, me nnompe mu dompe,
ne me honam mu nam ankasa nie.
Oyi na wɔbɛfrɛ no Ɔbaa,
ɛfiri sɛ Ɔbarima mu na wɔyii no firiiɛ.

verse.content: Saa nti na ɔbarima bɛgya n’agya ne na hɔ, na ɔde ne ho akɔbata ne yere ho, na wɔayɛ honam korɔ.
Na wɔn baanu no deda adagya, ɔbarima no ne ne yere, nanso wɔn ani anwu.

note.content: Kus yi ara na ebinom frɛ no Etiopia.
Ɛno ara ne Hidekel wɔ Hebri kasa mu.

verse.content: Na ɔwɔ yɛ aniteɛ kyɛne wiram mmoadoma a AWURADE Nyankopɔn yɛɛ wɔn nyinaa. Na ɔbisaa ɔbaa no sɛ: Ampa ara sɛ Onyankopɔn aka akyerɛ mo sɛ: Monnni turom ha nnua nyinaa bi?
Na ɔbaa no buaa ɔwɔ no sɛ: Turom ha nnua aba no, yɛdi bi;
nanso dua a ɛsi turo no mfimfini no aba deɛ, Onyankopɔn aka sɛ: Monnni bi, nso mommfa mo nsa nnka, na moanwu.
Na ɔwɔ no ka kyerɛɛ ɔbaa no sɛ: Ɛnyɛ wuo na mobɛwuo;
na Onyankopɔn nim sɛ da a mobɛdi bie no, mo ani bɛbue, na moayɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn
ahunu papa ne bɔne.
Na ɔbaa no hunuu sɛ dua no yɛ sɛ wɔdie, na ɛyɛ aniwa fɛ, ɛyɛ akɔnnɔ, na ɛbɛte ani, enti ɔtee n’aba bi, na ɔdii, na ɔde bi maa ne kunu a ɔka ne ho no nso, na ɔdii.
Na wɔn baanu ani buebuee, na wɔhunuu sɛ wɔdeda adagya, enti wɔpempam borɔdɔma ahahan yɛɛ nkatanim fae.
Na wɔtee AWURADE Nyankopɔn nka sɛ ɔnam turom hɔ wɔ anwummerɛ mferɛ mu. Na Adam ne ne yere kɔhunta firii AWURADE Nyankopɔn anim wɔ turom hɔ nnua mu.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn frɛɛ Adam, na ɔbisaa no sɛ: Wowɔ he?
Na ɔse: Metee wo nka wɔ turom hɔ no, mesuroe, ɛfiri sɛ meda adagya, na mehuntae.
Na ɔbisaa no sɛ: Hwan na ɔka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ woda adagya? Dua a mehyɛɛ wo sɛ nni bie no na woadie yi?
Na Adam kaa sɛ: Ɔbaa no a wode no bɛkaa me ho no, ɔno na ɔmaa me dua no aba no bie, na mediiɛ.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ ɔbaa no sɛ: Adɛn na woyɛɛ saa? Na ɔbaa no se: Ɔwɔ no na ɔdaadaa me, maa mediiɛ.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ ɔwɔ no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Ɛnam sɛ woayɛ yei nti,
wɔadome wo ntɔteboa
ne wiram mmoadoma nyinaa mu.
Wo yafunu so na wobɛnanteɛ,
na woadi dɔteɛ
wo nkwa nna nyinaa.
Na mede ɔtan bɛto wo ne ɔbaa no ntam,
ɛne w’asefoɔ ne n’asefoɔ ntam;
ɔno na ɔbɛbɔ wo tire,
na wo nso woaka ne nantin.

verse.content: Ɔbaa no deɛ, ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Dɔ na mɛma wo yea ne wo nyinsɛn mu brɛ adɔɔso.
Yea mu na wobɛwo mma,
na w’ani bɛgyina wo kunu,
na ɔno na ɔbɛdi wo soɔ.

verse.content: Na Adam deɛ, ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Sɛ woatie wo yere nne,
na woadi dua
a mehyɛɛ wo
sɛ nnie no bie nti,
wo nti wɔadome asase.
Yea mu na wobɛdidi soɔ wo nkwa nna nyinaa.
Na nkasɛɛ ne nnɛnkyɛnse na ɛbɛfifiri ama woɔ,
na woadi afuo mu ahahan.
W’anim fifire mu
na wobɛdidie
de akɔsi sɛ wobɛsane akɔ dɔteɛ mu,
ɛfiri sɛ emu na wɔyii wo firiiɛ;
na woyɛ dɔteɛ,
na dɔteɛ mu na wobɛsane akorɔ.

verse.content: Na Adam too ne yere din Hawa, ɛfiri sɛ ɔno na ɔyɛ ateasefoɔ nyinaa na.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn yɛɛ nwoma ntadeɛ maa Adam ne ne yere de hyɛɛ wɔn.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Hwɛ, onipa no ayɛ sɛ yɛn mu baako, ahunu papa ne bɔne. Na afei, deɛ ɛbɛyɛ na wantene ne nsa ante nkwa dua no nso bi anni antena ase daa nti,
AWURADE Nyankopɔn tuu no firii Eden turom hɔ sɛ ɔnkɔdɔ asase a wɔfaa no firii mu no.
Na ɔpamm onipa no, na ɔde Kerubim
ne ogyaframa afena a ɛdi ahim bɛsii Eden turo no anim apueeɛ fam sɛ wɔnwɛn ɔkwan a ɛde kɔ nkwa dua no ho no.

note.content: Ateasefoɔ bi a wɔwɔ ɔsoro a wɔbɔ nnoɔma kronkron ho ban.

verse.content: Na Adam ne ne yere Hawa daeɛ, na ɔnyinsɛnee, na ɔwoo Kain. Na ɔkaa sɛ: AWURADE adaworoma manya ɔbarima.
Na ɔwoo ne nua Habel kaa ne ho. Na Habel yɛ odwanhwɛfoɔ, ɛna Kain nso yɛ okuafoɔ.
Na ɛbaa sɛ nna bi akyiri no, Kain de afuom nnoɔma bɛyɛɛ AWURADE ayɛ.
Na Habel nso de ne nnwan mu mmakan ne wɔn a wɔadɔre no bi bɛmae. Na AWURADE ani sɔɔ Habel ne n’afɔrebɔdeɛ no,
nanso Kain ne n’afɔrebɔdeɛ no deɛ, n’ani ansɔ. Kain bo fuu pii, na ɔmunae.
Na AWURADE bisaa Kain sɛ: Adɛn nti na wo bo afuo na woamuna yi?
Sɛ woyɛɛ no yie a, anka w’anim rente anaa? Na sɛ woanyɛ no yie enti, bɔne butu ɛpono ano, na w’akyiri kwan na ɛhwehwɛ, nanso di ne so.
Na Kain ka kyerɛɛ ne nua sɛ, ma yɛn nkɔ afuom. Na ɛbaa sɛ wɔwɔ afuom no, Kain sɔre tiaa ne nua Habel, na ɔkumm no.
Na AWURADE bisaa Kain sɛ: Ɛhe na wo nua Habel wɔ? Na ɔse: Mennim, me nua so hwɛfoɔ ne me anaa?
Na AWURADE se: Ɛdeɛn na woayɛ yi? Wo nua mogya nne reteam frɛ me firi asase so.
Na afei wɔadome wo afiri asase a abue n’ano agye wo nua mogya afiri wo nsam no so.
Sɛ wodɔ asase a, ɛrenkɔ so mma wo ne nnɔbaeɛ bio na wobɛyɛ ɔkobɔni ne asesabɔni wɔ asase so.
Na Kain ka kyerɛɛ AWURADE sɛ: Me bɔne so adeɛ so kyɛne sɛ mɛtumi asoa.
Hwɛ, woapamo me nnɛ afiri asase yi so, na mɛhunta mafiri w’anim, na mayɛ ɔkobɔni ne asesabɔni wɔ asase so, na obiara a ɔbɛhu me no, ɔbɛku me.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɛno nti obiara a ɔbɛkum Kain no, wɔbɛtɔ ne so werɛ ahodoɔ nson. Na AWURADE yɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bi maa Kain, na obiara a ɔbɛhu no no anku no.
Na Kain firii AWURADE anim kɔe, na ɔkɔtenaa Nod asase so wɔ Eden apueeɛ.
Na Kain ne ne yere dae, na ɔnyinsɛnee, na ɔwoo Henok. Na ɔkyekyeree kuro bi, na ɔde ne ba Henok din too kuro no.
Na Henok woo Irad, na Irad woo Mehuyael. Na Mehuyael woo Metusael, na Metusael woo Lamek.
Na Lamek waree mmaa baanu, ɔbaako din de Ada, na deɛ ɔka ho no din de Sila.
Na Ada woo Yabal, ɔno na ɔyɛ ntomadan mu ne mmoa ho tenafoɔ agya.
Na ne nua din de Yubal; ɔno na ɔyɛ asankubɔfoɔ ne mmɛnhyɛnfoɔ nyinaa agya.
Na Sila nso woo Tubalkain a ɔyɛ kɔbere mfrafraeɛ ne dadeɛ adeɛ nyinaa atomfoɔ agya. Na Tubalkain nuabaa ne Naama.
Na Lamek ka kyerɛɛ ne yerenom sɛ:

block_quote.content: Ada ne Sila, montie me nne;
Lamek yerenom, monyɛ aso mma m’asɛm:
Mekumm ɔbarima sɛ ɔpiraa me,
mekumm aberanteɛ sɛ ɔboroo me.
Na sɛ wɔtɔɔ Kain so werɛ mprɛnson a,
Lamek deɛ bɛyɛ aduɔson nson.

verse.content: Na Adam ne ne yere daeɛ bio, na ɔwoo ɔbabarima, na ɔtoo ne din Set (aseɛ ne: Nsiananmu) sɛ: Onyankopɔn de ɔba foforɔ asi me Habel a Kain kumm no no ananmu.
Na Set nso, wɔwoo ɔba maa no, na ɔtoo ne din Enos. Ɛberɛ no mu na wɔfirii aseɛ bɔɔ AWURADE din sɔree no.
Adam awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nie: Da a Onyankopɔn bɔɔ onipa no, ɔbɔɔ no ne suban so.
Na ɔbɔɔ ɔbarima ne ɔbaa, na ɔhyiraa wɔn. Na ɔtoo wɔn din onipa.
Na Adam dii mfirinhyia ɔha aduasa no, ɔwoo ɔbabarima wɔ ne nsɛsoɔ ne ne suban so, na ɔtoo no din Set.
Na Adam woo Set no akyiri no, ɔdii mfirinhyia ahanwɔtwe, na emu no ɔsane woo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Adam nna a ɔdiiɛ ansa na ɔrewuo nyinaa yɛ mfeɛ ahankron aduasa.
Na Set dii mfirinhyia ɔha ne nnum na ɔwoo Enos.
Na Set woo Enos no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanwɔtwe ne nson, na emu no ɔsane woo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Set nna a ɔdiiɛ ansa na ɔrewuo nyinaa yɛ mfeɛ ahankron ne dummienu.
Na Enos dii mfirinhyia aduɔkron na ɔwoo Kenan.
Na Enos woo Kenan no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanwɔtwe ne dunum, na emu no ɔsane woo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Enos nna a ɔdiiɛ ansa na ɔrewuo nyinaa yɛ mfeɛ ahankron ne nnum.
Na Kenan dii mfirinhyia aduɔson na ɔwoo Ma-halalel.
Na Kenan woo Ma-halalel no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanwɔtwe aduanan, na emu no ɔsane woo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Kenan nna a ɔdiiɛ ansa na ɔrewuo nyinaa yɛ mfeɛ ahankron ne du.
Na Ma-halalel dii mfirinhyia aduosia nnum na ɔwoo Yared.
Na Ma-halalel woo Yared no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanwɔtwe aduasa, na emu no ɔsane woo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Ma-halalel nna a ɔdiiɛ ansa na ɔrewuo nyinaa yɛ mfeɛ ahanwɔtwe aduɔkron nnum.
Na Yared dii mfirinhyia ɔha aduosia mmienu na ɔwoo Henok.
Na Yared woo Henok akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanwɔtwe, na emu no ɔsane woo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Yared nna a ɔdiiɛ ansa na ɔrewuo nyinaa yɛ mfeɛ ahankron aduosia mmienu.
Na Henok dii mfirinhyia aduosia nnum na ɔwoo Metusela.
Na Henok woo Metusela no akyiri no, ɔne Onyankopɔn nantee mfirinhyia ahasa, na emu no ɔsane woo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Henok nna nyinaa yɛ mfeɛ ahasa aduosia nnum.
Na Henok ne Onyankopɔn nantee, na wɔanhunu no bio, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn faa no kɔe.
Na Metusela dii mfirinhyia ɔha aduɔwɔtwe nson na ɔwoo Lamek.
Na Metusela woo Lamek no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanson aduɔwɔtwe mmienu, na emu no ɔsane woo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Metusela nna a ɔdiiɛ ansa na ɔrewuo nyinaa yɛ mfeɛ ahankron aduosia nkron.
Na Lamek dii mfirinhyia ɔha aduɔwɔtwe mmienu no ɔwoo babarima.
Na ɔtoo ne din Noa, na ɔkaa sɛ: Oyi na ɔbɛkyekyere yɛn werɛ wɔ yɛn nnwuma ne yɛn nsa ano brɛ mu wɔ asase a AWURADE adome no soɔ.
Na Lamek woo Noa akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanum aduɔkron nnum, na emu no ɔsane woo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Lamek nna a ɔdiiɛ ansa na ɔrewuo nyinaa yɛ mfirinhyia ahanson aduɔson nson.
Na Noa dii mfirinhyia ahanum no, ɔwoo Sem, Ham ne Yafet.
Na nnipa firii aseɛ redɔɔso wɔ asase soɔ na wɔwoo mmammaa maa wɔn no,
Nyankopɔn mma hunuu nnipa mmammaa sɛ wɔn ho yɛ fɛ, na wɔwarewaree wɔn mu biara a wɔpɛ.
Na AWURADE kaa sɛ: Me honhom rentena onipa mu nkɔsi daa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ honam, enti ne nna bɛyɛ mfeɛ ɔha aduonu.
Nna no mu ne akyire no, na abrane akɛseɛ wɔ asase so. Na Nyankopɔn mma kɔɔ nnipa mmammaa ho na wɔwoo mma maa wɔn no, yeinom ne aberempɔn a wɔwɔ din firi tete.
Na AWURADE hunuu sɛ nnipa bɔne dɔɔso pii wɔ asase so, na wɔn akoma mu nsusuiɛ nyinaa yɛ bɔne nko daa nyinaa.
Na AWURADE nuu ne ho sɛ ɔyɛɛ onipa wɔ asase soɔ, na ɛyɛɛ no ya n’akomam.
Na AWURADE kaa sɛ: Mɛpepa nnipa a mabɔ wɔn no afiri asase ani, ampa ara, ɛfiri onipa so kɔsi ntɔteboa ne mmoa a wɔwea ne ewiem nnomaa so, ɛfiri sɛ manu me ho sɛ meyɛɛ wɔn.
Na Noa deɛ, ɔnyaa adom AWURADE anim.
Yei ne Noa ho asɛm: Na Noa yɛ onipa tenenee a ɔyɛ pɛ wɔ ne berɛ so nnipa mu. Noa ne Onyankopɔn nanteeɛ.
Na Noa woo mmammarima baasa, Sem, Ham, ne Yafet.
Na asase asɛe wɔ Nyankopɔn anim, na awurukasɛm ahyɛ asase so ma.
Na Onyankopɔn hunuu asase, na hwɛ, asɛe, ɛfiri sɛ na nnipa nyinaa asɛe wɔn akwan wɔ asase so.
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Noa sɛ: Abɔdeɛ nyinaa awieeɛ aba m’anim, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn awurukasɛm ahyɛ asase so ma, na hwɛ, mɛsɛe wɔn ne asase.
Fa ɔwawa yɛ adaka, na yɛ mpia wɔ adaka no mu, na fa ama ka emu ne ɛho.
Na sɛdeɛ yɛ no nie: Ne ntwemu basafa ɔha aduonum, ne trɛ basafa aduonu nnum, ne korɔn basafa dunum.
Yɛ adaka no ho mpomma, kɔsi sɛ aka anammɔn baako ne fa na aduru soro, na si adaka no ano pono ne nkyɛn mu, na yɛ nsamsoɔ mmiɛnsa, deɛ ɛdi aseɛ, deɛ ɛdi ntam ne deɛ ɛdi soro.
Na hwɛ, me, mede nsuyire bɛba asase so mabɛsɛe abɔdeɛ a nkwa home wɔ wɔn mu nyinaa ɔsoro ase; asase so adeɛ nyinaa rebɛwuwu.
Na me ne wo bɛyɛ apam ato hɔ, na woakɔ adaka no mu, wo ne wo mma, ne wo yere, ne wo mma yerenom.
Na fa honam a ɛte aseɛ nyinaa mu mmienu mmienu, onini ne ɔbedeɛ, kɔ adaka no mu, na wɔnnya nkwa nka wo ho.
Nnomaa sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ, ne ntɔteboa, sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ, ne mmoa a wɔwea asase soɔ nyinaa, sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ, wɔn nyinaa mu mmienu mmienu mmra wo nkyɛn, na wɔanya nkwa.
Na wo deɛ, boaboa aduane nyinaa bi ano kɔ mu, na ayɛ wo ne wɔn aduane.
Na Noa yɛɛ sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ no no nyinaa pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Noa sɛ: Wo ne wo fiefoɔ nyinaa, monkɔ adaka no mu, ɛfiri sɛ wo na mahu wo sɛ ɔteneneeni m’anim, ɛberɛ yi mu.
Mmoa a wɔn ho teɛ nyinaa mu, fa nson nson, anini ne abedeɛ. Na mmoa a wɔn ho nteɛ mu, fa mmienu mmienu, onini ne ɔbedeɛ;
ewiem nnomaa mu nso fa nson nson, anini ne abedeɛ, na wɔn ase nnya nkwa asase nyinaa ani.
Ɛfiri sɛ aka nnanson na matɔ osuo agu asase so adaduanan awia ne anadwo, na mapepa adeɛ a nkwa wɔ mu a mayɛ nyinaa afiri asase ani.
Na Noa yɛɛ sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ no no nyinaa.
Ɛberɛ a nsuyire no baa asase soɔ no na Noa adi mfirinhyia ahansia.
Nsuo a na ɛrebɛyire no nti, Noa ne ne mma, ne ne yere, ne ne mma yerenom kɔɔ adaka no mu.
Mmoa a wɔn ho teɛ ne mmoa a wɔn ho nteɛ ne nnomaa ne wɔn a wɔwea asase soɔ nyinaa mu
mmienu mmienu baa Noa nkyɛn adaka no mu, onini ne ɔbedeɛ, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ Noa no.
Na nnanson akyiri no, nsuyire baa asase so.
Noa dii mfirinhyia ahansia no, bosome a ɛtɔ so mmienu no dadu nnanson soɔ, da no ara, ebunu kɛseɛ no nsuo ani nyinaa paepaee, na ɔsoro mpomma buebuee.
Na osuo tɔɔ asase so pii adaduanan, awia ne anadwo.
Saa da yi ara (a nsuyire yi hyɛɛ aseɛ no) mu na Noa ne ne yere, ne ne mma, Sem, Ham ne Yafet, ne ne mma yerenom baasa akɔhyɛ adaka no mu.
Na mmoadoma nyinaa, ntɔteboa, mmoa a wɔwea asase soɔ, ntuboa nyinaa, sɛdeɛ wɔn su teɛ,
ne wɔn na ɛkɔɔ mu. Honam a nkwa home wɔ wɔn mu nyinaa mu mmienu mmienu na wɔbaa Noa nkyɛn wɔ adaka no mu.
Wɔn a ɛbaeɛ no, na wɔyɛ honam nyinaa mu anini ne abedeɛ, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ no no; na AWURADE too no mu.
Na nsuyire no baa asase so adaduanan, na nsuo no yiriiɛ, na ɛmaa adaka no so firii asase so.
Na nsuo no yirii dodo wɔ asase so; maa adaka no tɛɛ nsuo no ani.
Na nsuo no boroo so ara wɔ asase so, na ɛkataa mmepɔ nyinaa so.
Nsuo no boroo so kɔɔ soro basafa nson ne fa na ɛkataa mmepɔ so.
Na abɔdeɛ a ɛte aseɛ nyinaa, nnomaa, ntɔteboa, wiram mmoa, mmoa a wɔwea asase soɔ, ne nnipa nyinaa;
wɔn a nkwa home wɔ wɔn mu, na wɔte asase pɛsɛɛ soɔ nyinaa wuwui.
Na ɔpepaa biribiara a nkwa wom a ɛwɔ asase ani, ɛfiri nnipa so kɔsi ntɔteboa ne mmoa a wɔwea ne ewiem nnomaa so. Na wɔpepaa wɔn firii asase so, na ɛkaa Noa nko ara ne wɔn a wɔne no wɔ adaka no mu no.
Na nsuo no yirii wɔ asase so nna ɔha aduonum.
Na Onyankopɔn kaee Noa ne mmoadoma nyinaa ne ntɔteboa nyinaa a wɔne no wɔ adaka no mu nyinaa. Na Onyankopɔn maa mframa bɔ faa asase so, na nsuo no ano brɛɛ ase.
Na ebunu no nsuo aniwa sisii, na ɔsoro mpomma mu totoe, maa osuo a ɛfiri soro no gyaee tɔ;
na nsuo no twe firii asase so ara. Na ɛfiri nna ɔha aduonum akyiri no na na nsuo no so rehwan.
Na ɛda a ɛtɔ so dunson wɔ bosome nson mu no, adaka no kɔsii Ararat mmepɔ so.
Na nsuo no kɔɔ so twee ara kɔsii bosome a ɛtɔ so du no so; na saa bosome no ara, ne da a ɛdi kan no na mmepɔ atifi dedaa adie.
Na ɛno akyiri adaduanan no, Noa buee adaka no mpomma a ɔyɛeɛ no,
na ɔsomaa anene. Na ɔfirii adi, na ɔdii akɔneaba de kɔsii sɛ nsuo no wee asase soɔ.
Na ɔsomaa aburuburo sɛ ɔnkɔhwɛ sɛ nsuo no awe wɔ asase ani anaa.
Nanso aburuburo no annya ne nan sibea, na ɔsane baa ne nkyɛn adaka no mu, ɛfiri sɛ na nsuo no da so wɔ asase nyinaa ani. Na ɔtenee ne nsa faa no baa ne nkyɛn wɔ adaka no mu.
Na ɔtwɛn nnanson bio, na ɔsomaa aburuburo firii adaka no mu bio.
Na aburuburo no baa ne nkyɛn anwummerɛ, na hwɛ, ngo dua ahahan frɔmfrɔm tua n’ano. Noa hunuu sɛ nsuo no awe asase so.
Na ɔtwɛn nnanson bio no, ɔsomaa aburuburo no; na wansane amma ne nkyɛn bio.
Na Noa afe a ɛtɔ so ahansia ne baako, bosome a ɛdi kan no da a ɛdi kan no na na nsuo no awe asase soɔ. Na Noa yii suhyɛ no firii adaka no so, na ɔhwɛe, na hwɛ, na asase ani awo.
Bosome a ɛtɔ so mmienu no da a ɛtɔ so aduonu nson no na na asase so awo koraa.
Na Onyankopɔn kasa kyerɛɛ Noa sɛ:
Firi adaka no mu, wo ne wo yere, wo mma ne wɔn yerenom a wɔka wo ho;
mmoadoma a wɔka wo ho nyinaa a ɛfiri honam nyinaa mu, nnomaa ne ntɔteboa ne deɛ ɛwea asase soɔ nyinaa ne wo mfiri adi, na wɔnwo, na wɔnnɔɔso asase so.
Na Noa ne ne yere, ne ne mma ne wɔn yerenom firii adi;
mmoadoma nyinaa, wɔn a wɔwea nyinaa ne nnomaa nyinaa, ne deɛ nkwa wɔ mu biara, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmoaban teɛ, firi adaka no mu firii adi.
Na Noa sii afɔrebukyia maa AWURADE, na ɔfaa ntɔteboa a wɔn ho teɛ nyinaa mu bi ne nnomaa a wɔn ho teɛ nyinaa mu bi de wɔn bobɔɔ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ wɔ bukyia no so.
Na AWURADE tee afɔdeɛ no hwam no, ɔkaa no n’akoma mu sɛ: Onipa nti merennome asase bio, ɛfiri sɛ onipa akoma mu adwene yɛ bɔne firi ne mmɔfraase, na merensɛe deɛ ɛte aseɛ nyinaa bio, sɛdeɛ mayɛ yi.

block_quote.content: Nna a asase wɔ hɔ yi nyinaa,
oguo ne otwa, awɔ ne ahuhuro,
asuso ne ɔpɛ, awia ne anadwo
rennyae da.

note.content: : Gye 6.5; Dwom 14.3; Hiob 14.4; Mat 15.19; Rom 3.23; Yes 54.9

verse.content: Na Onyankopɔn hyiraa Noa ne ne mma, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monwo na monnɔɔso, na monhyɛ asase so ma.
Na mo ho hu ne mo ho suro mmra asase so mmoadoma nyinaa ne ewiem nnomaa nyinaa, deɛ ɛwea fam nyinaa ne ɛpo mu mpataa nyinaa so; mo nsa na wɔde wɔn ahyɛ.
Deɛ ɛkeka ne ho a ɛwɔ nkwa nyinaa, ɛnyɛ mo aduane; mede ne nyinaa mama mo, sɛdeɛ mede nhahan mono memaa mo no.
Nam a ne mogya da so wɔ ne mu nko na monnnie.
Na onipa biara a ɔka onipa mogya guo no, ne nsam mu na mɛbisa, na aboa mpo ka onipa mogya gu a mɛbisa afiri ne nsam.

block_quote.content: Deɛ ɔhwie onipa mogya guo no,
onipa so na wɔnam bɛhwie ne mogya aguo,
ɛfiri sɛ Nyankopɔn suban so
na ɔyɛɛ onipa.

verse.content: Na mo deɛ, monwo na monnɔ, na monnɔɔso wɔ asase so.
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Noa ne ne mma a wɔka ne ho no sɛ:
Hwɛ, afei merema m’apam atim hɔ ama mo ne mo asefoɔ a ɛbɛdi mo akyi,
ɛne akra a ɛtete aseɛ a ɛka mo ho nyinaa, nnomaa, ntɔteboa ne asase so mmoadoma a wɔne mo wɔ hɔ firi adaka no mu nyinaa.
Na mama me ne mo apam yi agyina hɔ, sɛ meremfa nsuyire mensɛe abɔdeɛ nyinaa bio, na nsuyire remma mmɛsɛe asase bio.
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Apam a merema ada me ne mo ne akra ateasefoɔ a ɛka mo ho nyinaa ntam akɔ nnasanten awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ soɔ no ho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ nie:
Me nyankontɔn na mede masi mununkum mu, na ayɛ me ne asase ntam apam no ho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ.
Na sɛ mede mununkum meba asase so a, wɔbɛhunu nyankontɔn no wɔ mununkum no mu;
na makae m’apam a ɛwɔ me ne mo, ne abɔdeɛ nyinaa mu ateasefoɔ ntam no, na nsuo annane nsuyire ansɛe abɔdeɛ nyinaa bio.
Na nyankontɔn no bɛba mununkum mu, na mahwɛ, na mede makae daa apam a ɛwɔ Onyankopɔn ne nnipa ne abɔdeɛ mu ateasefoɔ a ɛwɔ asase soɔ nyinaa no ntam.
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Noa sɛ: Yei ne apam a mama no agyina me ne honam a ɛwɔ asase nyinaa ntam no ho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ.
Na Noa mma a wɔfirii adaka no mu firii adie ne Sem, Ham ne Yafet; na Ham ne Kanaan n’agya.
Yeinom ne Noa mma baasa no. Wɔn mu na nnipa firi petee asase nyinaa soɔ.
Na Noa firii aseɛ yɛɛ kua, na ɔyɛɛ bobeturo.
Na ɔnom nsa no bi, na ɔboroe, na ɔda ne ntomadan mu a ne ho da hɔ.
Na Kanaan agya Ham kɔhunuu n’agya adagya mu, na ɔkɔka kyerɛɛ ne nuanom baanu no wɔ adihɔ.
Na Sem ne Yafet faa ntoma de guu wɔn mmatiri so nam nkyirinkyire de kɔkataa wɔn agya adagya so, na wɔdanee wɔn ani kyerɛɛ akyire, na wɔanhunu wɔn agya adagya mu.
Na Noa ani so tete firii ne nsaborɔ mu na ɔtee deɛ ne ba kumaa no ayɛ no no,
ɔkaa sɛ:

block_quote.content: Wɔadome Kanaan,
ɔbɛyɛ nkoa mu akoa ama ne nuanom.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa nso sɛ:

block_quote.content: Nhyira ne Sem Nyankopɔn, AWURADE,
na Kanaan nyɛ wɔn akoa.
Onyankopɔn mma Yafet ase ntrɛ,
na ɔntena Sem ntomadan mu,
na Kanaan nyɛ wɔn akoa.

verse.content: Na nsuyire akyiri no, Noa tenaa ase mfirinhyia ahasa aduonum.
Na Noa nna a ɔdiiɛ nyinaa yɛ mfeɛ ahankron aduonum, na ɔwui.
Na yeinom ne Noa mma Sem, Ham ne Yafet awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ. Na nsuyire no akyi, wɔwoo mma.
Yafet mma nie: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Yawan, Tubal, Mesek ne Tiras.
Na Gomer mma ne Askenas, Rifat ne Togarma.
Na Yawan mma ne Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim ne Dodanim.
Yeinom mu na nsuano amanaman no firi kɔpetee wɔn nsase soɔ, sɛdeɛ wɔn mu biara kasa ne wɔn mmusua teɛ, wɔn amanaman mu.
Na Ham mma ne Kus, Misraim, Put ne Kanaan.
Na Kus mma ne Seba, Hawila, Sabta, Raama ne Sabteka. Na Raama mma ne Saba ne Dedan.
Na Kus woo Nimrod. Ɔno na ɔdii kan yɛɛ ɔkatakyie wɔ asase soɔ.
Na ɔyɛ ɔbɔmmɔfoɔ wɔ AWURADE anim; enti na wɔka sɛ: Ɔbɔmmɔfoɔ kɛseɛ a ɔwɔ tumi AWURADE anim te sɛ Nimrod nie.
Na n’ahennie mfitiaseɛ ne Babel, Erek, Akad ne Kalne a ɛwɔ Sinear asase soɔ.
Asase no so na ɔfiri kɔɔ Asiria kɔkyekyeree Ninewe ne Rehobot-ir ne Kala,
ne Resen kuro kɛseɛ a ɛda Ninewe ne Kala ntam no.
Na Misraim woo Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naftuhim,
Patrusim, Kasluhim (a Filistifoɔ firii wɔn mu), ne Kaftorim.
Kanaan woo n’abakan Sidon, ne Het,
Yebusifoɔ, Amorifoɔ, Girgasifoɔ,
Hiwifoɔ, Arkifoɔ, Sinifoɔ,
Arwadfoɔ, Semarifoɔ ne Hamatfoɔ. Ɛno akyi na Kanaanfoɔ mmusua peteeɛ.
Na Kanaanfoɔ hyeɛ firi Sidon kɔduru Gerar de kɔsi Gasa kɔduru Sodom, Gomora, Adma ne Seboim de kɔsi Lasa.
Yeinom ne Ham mma, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua ne wɔn kasa, wɔn nsase ne wɔn amanaman teɛ.
Sem a ɔyɛ Yafet nua panin no mu na Eber mma nyinaa firie.
Sem mma ne Elam, Asur, Arfaksad, Lud ne Aram.
Na Aram mma ne Us, Hul, Geter ne Mas.
Na Arfaksad woo Sela, na Sela woo Eber.
Na Eber woo mma baanu. Deɛ ɔdi kan no din de Peleg,
ɛfiri sɛ ne nna mu na wɔkyekyɛɛ asase mu; na ne nua din de Yoktan.
Na Yoktan woo Almodad, Selef, Hasarmawet, Yera,
Hadoram, Usal, Dikla,
Obal, Abimael, Saba,
Ofir, Hawila ne Yobab. Yeinom nyinaa ne Yoktan mma.
Na wɔn tenabea firi Mesa kɔduru Sefar, apueeɛ bepɔ so.
Yeinom ne Sem mma, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua ne wɔn kasa, wɔn nsase ne wɔn amanaman teɛ.
Yeinom ne Noa mma mmusua, sɛdeɛ wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ teɛ wɔ wɔn amanaman mu. Na ɛfiri yeinom mu na nsuyire no akyi amanaman petee asase soɔ.
Na asase nyinaa sofoɔ yɛ anokorɔ kasa kasa korɔ.
Na wɔtuu kwan faa apueeɛ no, wɔhunuu asasetam bi wɔ Sinear asase so, na wɔtenaa hɔ.
Na wɔsesee wɔn ho wɔn ho sɛ: Wiɛ, momma yɛnyɛ ntaayaa, na yɛnto! Na ntaayaa no yɛɛ wɔn aboɔ, na ama yɛɛ wɔn dɔteɛ.
Ɛnna wɔkaa sɛ: Wiɛ, momma yɛnkyekyere kuro, na yɛnto abantenten a n’atifi bɛduru soro, na yɛmfa nnye din, na yɛanhwete asase nyinaa ani.
Na AWURADE siane bɛhwɛɛ kuro ne abantenten a nnipa mma retoɔ no.
Na AWURADE kaa sɛ: Hwɛ, wɔyɛ ɔman baako, na wɔn nyinaa ka kasa korɔ; na deɛ wɔafiri aseɛ reyɛ nie; na afei, biribiara rentumi nsi wɔn deɛ wɔsusu sɛ wɔbɛyɛ no biara ho kwan.
Wiɛ, momma yɛnsiane nkɔ hɔ na yɛnkɔyɛ wɔn kasa basabasa, na wɔn mu biara ante ne yɔnko kasa bio.
Na ɛfiri hɔnom na AWURADE bɔɔ wɔn hwetee asase nyinaa ani, na wɔgyaee kuro no kyekyerɛ.
Enti na wɔfrɛ hɔ Babel,
ɛfiri sɛ ɛhɔ na AWURADE yɛɛ asase nyinaa kasa basabasa. Ɛfiri hɔ na AWURADE bɔɔ wɔn hwetee asase nyinaa ani.
Yeinom ne Sem awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ: Sem dii mfirinhyia ɔha na ɔwoo Arfaksad, nsuyire no akyiri mfeɛ mmienu.
Na Sem woo Arfaksad no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanum na ɔwoo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Arfaksad dii mfirinhyia aduasa nnum na ɔwoo Sela.
Na ɔwoo Sela no akyi no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanan ne mmiɛnsa, na ɔwoo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Sela dii mfirinhyia aduasa na ɔwoo Eber.
Na Sela woo Eber no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanan ne mmiɛnsa na ɔwoo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Eber dii mfirinhyia aduasa nnan na ɔwoo Peleg.
Na ɔwoo Peleg no akyi no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanan aduasa na ɔwoo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Peleg dii mfirinhyia aduasa na ɔwoo Reu.
Peleg woo Reu no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanu ne nkron na ɔwoo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Reu dii mfirinhyia aduasa mmienu na ɔwoo Serug.
Na Reu woo Serug no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanu ne nson, na ɔwoo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Serug dii mfirinhyia aduasa na ɔwoo Nahor.
Na Serug woo Nahor no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ahanu na ɔwoo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Nahor dii mfirinhyia aduonu nkron na ɔwoo Tera.
Na Nahor woo Tera no akyiri no, ɔdii mfeɛ ɔha ne dunkron na ɔwoo mmammarima ne mmammaa.
Na Tera dii mfirinhyia aduɔson na ɔwoo Abram, Nahor ne Haran.
Na yeinom ne Tera awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ: Tera woo Abram, Nahor ne Haran, na Haran woo Lot.
Na Haran wuu n’agya Tera anim, asase a wɔwoo no soɔ no so, ɛne Ur a ɛwɔ Kaldea.
Na Abram ne Nahor waree yerenom, Abram yere din de Sarai, na Nahor yere din de Milka a ɔyɛ Haran babaa. Na Haran yɛ Milka ne Iska agya.
Na Sarai yɛ obonini, na ɔnni ba.
Na Tera faa ne ba Abram ne ne nana Lot, a ɔyɛ Haran ba, ne n’ase Sarai, ne ba Abram yere, na ɔne wɔn firii Ur a ɛwɔ Kaldea sɛ wɔrekɔ Kanaan asase so. Na wɔduruu Haran no, wɔtenaa hɔ.
Na Tera nna yɛ mfeɛ ahanu ne nnum, na Tera wuu wɔ Haran.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Abram sɛ: Wo deɛ, firi w’asase so ne w’abusua mu ne w’agya fie kɔ asase a mɛkyerɛ woɔ no so.
Na mɛyɛ wo ɔman kɛseɛ, na mahyira wo, na mama wo din ayɛ kɛseɛ, na woayɛ nhyira.
Na mɛhyira wɔn a wɔhyira woɔ, na wɔn a wɔdome woɔ no, mɛdome wɔn; na wo mu na wɔbɛhyira asase so mmusua nyinaa.
Na Abram kɔe sɛdeɛ AWURADE kasa kyerɛɛ no no, na Lot ne no kɔe. Na Abram firii Haran no, na wadi mfeɛ aduɔson nnum.
Na Abram faa ne yere Sarai ne ne nua ba Lot ne wɔn ahodeɛ a wɔanya nyinaa ne nnipa a wɔnyaa wɔn wɔ Haran, na wɔfirii hɔ sɛ wɔrekɔ Kanaan asase so; na wɔkɔduruu Kanaan asase so.
Na Abram twaa mu asase no so kɔduruu baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Sekem wɔ More pɔ no ho. Nso berɛ no mu na Kanaanfoɔ wɔ asase no so.
Na AWURADE yii ne ho kyerɛɛ Abram kaa sɛ: W’asefoɔ na mede asase yi bɛma wɔn. Na ɔsii afɔrebukyia wɔ hɔ maa AWURADE a ɔyii ne ho kyerɛɛ no no.
Na ɔtu firii hɔ kɔɔ Betel apueeɛ bepɔ bi so. Na ɔsii ne ntomadan a Betel da n’atɔeɛ, na Ai da apueeɛ; na ɔsii afɔrebukyia maa AWURADE wɔ hɔ, na ɔsɔree AWURADE.
Na Abram dii atutena ara kɔɔ Negeb.
Na ɛkɔm baa asase no so, na Abram siane kɔtenaa Misraim kɔyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ wɔ hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ na ɛkɔm no mu yɛ den asase no so.
Na ɔreyɛ aduru Misraim asase soɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ ne yere Sarai sɛ: Hwɛ, menim sɛ woyɛ ɔbaa a wo ho yɛ fɛ,
na sɛ Misraimfoɔ hu wo a, wɔbɛka sɛ: Ne yere nie, na wɔaku me, na wɔama woatena ase.
Enti ka sɛ, me nua ne wo, na wo nti wɔayɛ me yie, na matena ase.
Na Abram duruu Misraim no, Misraimfoɔ hunuu ne yere no sɛ ne ho yɛ fɛ sɛ.
Na Farao atitire hunuu no, na wɔkɔkamfoo no kyerɛɛ Farao, na wɔbɛfaa ɔbaa no kɔɔ Farao fie.
Na ne nti ɔyɛɛ Abram yie; na ɔnyaa nnwan, anantwie, mfunumu, nkoa, mfenaa, mfunumubereɛ ne yoma.
Na Abram yere Sarai ho asɛm no nti AWURADE de ɔhaw akɛseɛ haa Farao ne ne fie.
Na Farao frɛɛ Abram kaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na woayɛ me yi? Adɛn nti na woanka ankyerɛ me sɛ ɔyɛ wo yerɛ?
Adɛn nti na wose: Ɔyɛ me nua? Anka meremfa no nware no; na afei, hwɛ wo yere nie, fa no na kɔ wo kwan.
Na Farao tuu nnipa maa no sɛ wɔnkɔgya no ne ne yere ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa kwan.
Na Abram ne ne yere ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa, ne Lot nso, firii Misraim baa Negeb.
Na Abram anya ne ho sɛ, mmoa, dwetɛ ne sika mu.
Na ɔdii atutena firi Negeb kɔduruu Betel, deɛ akane na ne ntomadan sie no, wɔ Betel ne Ai ntam,
deɛ afɔrebukyia a ɔsii kane no wɔ. Na Abram sɔree AWURADE wɔ hɔ.
Na Lot nso a ɔne Abram nam no wɔ nnwan ne anantwie ne ntomadan.
Na asase no nso mma wɔn sɛ wɔbɛtena faako, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn ahodeɛ dɔɔso sɛ, enti wɔantumi antena faako.
Na akasakasa baa Abram mmoahwɛfoɔ ne Lot mmoahwɛfoɔ ntam. Na berɛ no mu na Kanaanfoɔ ne Perisifoɔ tete asase no so.
Na Abram ka kyerɛɛ Lot sɛ: Mesrɛ wo, mma akasakasa mmma me ne wo ntam, ne me mmoahwɛfoɔ ne wo mmoahwɛfoɔ ntam, na yɛyɛ anuanom.
Ɛnyɛ asase no nyinaa na ɛda w’anim yi? Mesrɛ wo, twe wo ho firi me ho, sɛ wofa benkum a, mɛfa nifa, na sɛ wofa nifa a, mɛfa benkum.
Na Lot maa n’ani so hwɛɛ Yordan kanko nyinaa de kɔsi Soar hunuu sɛ ne nyinaa so wɔ nsuo te sɛ AWURADE turo no, te sɛ Misraim, ansa na AWURADE resɛe Sodom ne Gomora no.
Na Lot yii Yordan kanko no nyinaa, na ɔtu faa apueeɛ fam; na anuanom no dii mpaapaemu.
Abram tenaa Kanaan asase so, na Lot deɛ, ɔtenaa Yordan kanko no nkuro mu, na ɔtutuu ne ntomadan ara de kɔduruu Sodom.
Nso na Sodomfoɔ yɛ atirimuɔdenfoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ kɛse, AWURADE anim.
Na Lot tee ne ho firii Abram ho no, AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Abram sɛ: Ma w’ani so, na firi deɛ wowɔ hɔ hwɛ atifi fam ne anafoɔ fam, apueeɛ ne atɔeɛ.
Na asase a wohunu yi nyinaa, wo ne w’asefoɔ na mede bɛma mo daa.
Na mɛma w’asefoɔ adɔɔso sɛ asase so mfuturo. Na sɛ obi tumi kan asase so mfuturo a, ɛnneɛ na ɔbɛtumi akan w’asefoɔ nso.
Sɔre, fa asase no tentene ne ne tɛtrɛtɛ mu, na wo na mede bɛma woɔ.
Na Abram tutuu ne ntomadan, na ɔbɛtenaa Mamre pɔ a ɛwɔ Hebron no ho, na ɔsii afɔrebukyia maa AWURADE wɔ hɔ.
Na Sinear hene Amrafel, Elasar hene Ariok, Elam hene Kedorlaomer ne Goiim hene Tideal berɛ so no,
wɔne Sodom hene Bera ne Gomora hene Birsa, Adma hene Sinab ne Seboim hene Semeber ne Bela (a ɛne Soar) hene dii ako.
Ahemfo yeinom nyinaa bɛhyiaa Sidim bonhwa mu, (ɛno ne Nkyene Po no).
Mfirinhyia dummienu na wɔsomm Kedorlaomer, na afe a ɛtɔ so dummiɛnsa no, wɔtee atua.
Na afe a ɛtɔ so dunan mu no, Kedorlaomer ne ahemfo a wɔkeka ne ho no bɛkum Refaim wɔ Asterot-karnaim, ne Susifoɔ wɔ Ham, ne Emifoɔ Kiriataim mpaperɛ so,
ne Horifoɔ wɔ wɔn bepɔ Seir so de kɔsii El-paran a ɛwɔ ɛserɛ soɔ no.
Na wɔsane baa Enmispat, (ɛne Kades), na wɔkaa Amalekfoɔ asase nyinaa ne Amorifoɔ nso a wɔte Haseson-tamar no gui.
Na Sodom, Gomora, Adma, Seboim ne Bela (a ɛne Soar) ahemfo firi bae.
Na wɔne Elam hene Kedorlaomer, Goiim hene Tideal, Sinear hene Amrafel ne Elasar hene Ariok de bɛbɔɔ ani wɔ Sidim bonhwa mu, ahemfo baanan a wɔreko atia baanum.
Na Sidim bonhwa mu yɛ ama amena ara nko. Na Sodom ne Gomora ahemfo dwanee. Na ebinom totɔɔ amena no mu, na wɔn a aka no dwane kɔɔ bepɔ so.
Na wɔfaa Sodom ne Gomora nnoɔma ne wɔn nnuane nyinaa de sii mu kɔe.
Na wɔfaa Abram nua ba Lot a ɔte Sodom ne n’ahodeɛ kɔe.
Na odwanefoɔ bi bɛka kyerɛɛ Hebrini Abram a ɔte Amorini Mamre, Eskol ne Aner nua no pɔ mu; na wɔne Abram wɔ apam.
Na Abram tee sɛ wɔafa ne nua ba dommum no, ɔde ne mmarima a wɔawo wɔn wɔ ne fie ahasa ne dunwɔtwe tuu ɔsa tii wɔn kɔduruu Dan.
Na ɔne ne nkoa kyɛɛ wɔn ho mu baa wɔn so anadwo, na wɔbobɔɔ wɔn, na wɔtaa wɔn kɔduruu Hoba a ɛda Damasko benkum no.
Na ɔde nnoɔma no nyinaa ne ne nua ba Lot ne ne nnoɔma ne mmaa no nso ne nkurɔfoɔ no sane bae.
Na ɔsane firii Kedorlaomer ne ahemfo a ɛkeka ne ho so nkonimdie reba no, Sodom hene firi kɔhyiaa no wɔ Sawe bonhwa (a ɛne Ɔhene Bonhwa no) mu.
Na Salem hene Melkisedek de paanoo ne bobesa brɛɛ no; na ɔyɛ ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn sɔfoɔ.
Na ɔhyiraa no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn a ɔyɛ ɔsoro ne asase wura no
nhyira nka Abram.
Na nhyira ne ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn
a ɔde w’atamfo ahyɛ wo nsa.
Na Abram maa no nnoɔma no nyinaa mu ntotosoɔ du du.

verse.content: Na Sodom hene ka kyerɛɛ Abram sɛ: Fa nnipa no ma me, na fa ahodeɛ no.
Na Abram ka kyerɛɛ Sodom hene no sɛ: Mema me nsa so mekyerɛ AWURADE, ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn a ɔyɛ ɔsoro ne asase wura no,
sɛ ɛfiri asaawa so de kɔsi mpaboa homa soɔ, meremfa biribiara a ɛyɛ wo deɛ, na woanka sɛ: Me na mama Abram anya ne ho;
gye deɛ mmeranteɛ no adie no nko, ne mmarima a wɔne me kɔeɛ no, Aner, Eskol ne Mamre nya wɔn kyɛfa.
Nsɛm yi akyiri no, AWURADE asɛm baa Abram nkyɛn anisoadehunu mu sɛ: Nsuro, Abram, mene wo kyɛm, na w’akatua bɛdɔɔso pii.
Na Abram bisaa sɛ: AWURADE Nyankopɔn, ɛdeɛn na wode bɛma me? Menni ba na menam, na deɛ ɔbɛdi m’adeɛ ne Damaskoni Eliesa anaa?
Na Abram kaa sɛ: Ao, me deɛ, woamma me asefoɔ, na hwɛ, me fienipa na ɔbɛdi m’adeɛ.
Na AWURADE asɛm baa ne nkyɛn sɛ: Ɛnyɛ oyi na ɔbɛdi w’adeɛ, na deɛ ɔbɛfiri wo ara w’asene mu na ɔbɛdi w’adeɛ.
Na ɔde no firii adi kaa sɛ: Hwɛ ɔsoro ɛ, na kan nsoromma sɛ wobɛtumi akan anaa? Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sɛ w’asefoɔ bɛyɛ ne no.
Na Abram gyee AWURADE diiɛ, na ɔbuu yei sɛ tenenee maa no.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Mene AWURADE a ɔde wo firii Ur a ɛwɔ Kaldea no, sɛ mede asase yi bɛma wo sɛ agyapadeɛ.
Na ɔbisaa sɛ: AWURADE Nyankopɔn, ɛdeɛn na mede bɛhunu sɛ mɛnya?
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Fa nantwie ba a wadi mfeɛ mmiɛnsa, abirekyie a wadi mfeɛ mmiɛnsa, odwennini a wadi mfeɛ mmiɛnsa, anyankuku ne aborɔnoma ba brɛ me.
Na ɔde yei nyinaa brɛɛ no, na ɔpaepaee wɔn mu mmienu mmienu, na ɔde afaafa no kyerɛkyerɛɛ anim totoo hɔ; na nnomaa no deɛ, wampaapae wɔn mu.
Na nnomaa a wɔdi nam bɛsisii mmoa afunu no so, na Abram pamm wɔn.
Na owia reyɛ akɔtɔ no, Abram daa nnahɔɔ, na hwɛ, ehu sum kabii duruu no.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Abram sɛ: Hunu ampa ara sɛ w’asefoɔ bɛyɛ ahɔhoɔ asase a ɛnyɛ wɔn dea so, na wɔayɛ nkoa na wɔasom, na wɔbɛha wɔn mfirinhyia ahanan.
Na ɔman a wɔbɛsom wɔn no, mɛbu wɔn atɛn, na akyire yi no, wɔde ahodeɛ pii bɛfiri hɔ akɔ.
Na wo deɛ, wobɛkɔ wo nananom nkyɛn asomdwoeɛ mu, na wɔasie wo nkɔkoraaberɛ pa mu.
Na awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nnan mu na wɔbɛsane aba ha, ɛfiri sɛ Amorifoɔ amumuyɛ nnya nnurui.
Na owia tɔeɛ na esum kusuu duruiɛ no, hwɛ, biribi a ɛte sɛ gyaframa a ɛrefiri wisie ne tɛnee a ɛredɛre bɛfaa afaafa no ntam.
Da no ara na AWURADE ne Abram yɛɛ apam sɛ: W’asefoɔ na mede asase yi mama wɔn ɛfiri Misraim asubɔnten ho de kɔsi asubɔnten kɛseɛ, Eufrate asubɔnten ho:
Kenifoɔ, Kenisifoɔ, Kadmonifoɔ,
Hetifoɔ, Perisifoɔ, Refaimfoɔ,
Amorifoɔ, Kanaanfoɔ, Girgasifoɔ ne Yebusifoɔ.
Na Abram yere Sarai nwo mma no. Na ɔwɔ afenaa bi a ɔyɛ Misraimni a ne din de Hagar.
Na Sarai ka kyerɛɛ Abram sɛ: Hwɛ, AWURADE asi m’awoɔ ho kwan, enti kɔ m’afenaa nkyɛn, ebia mɛnya ne ho mma. Na Abram tiee Sarai.
Na Abram tenaa Kanaan asase so mfirinhyia du no, ne yere Sarai faa n’afenaa Hagar a ɔyɛ Misraimni no de no maa ne kunu awareɛ.
Na ɔkɔɔ Hagar ho, na ɔnyinsɛnee. Na ɔhunuu sɛ wanyinsɛn no, ɔbuu n’awuraa animtia.
Na Sarai ka kyerɛɛ Abram sɛ: Asɛmmɔne a wadi me da wo so. Me na mede m’afenaa mato wo kokom, na ɔhunuu sɛ wanyinsɛn nti, ɔbu me animtia. AWURADE mmu me ne wo ntam atɛn.
Ɛnna Abram ka kyerɛɛ Sarai sɛ: Hwɛ, w’afenaa wɔ wo nsam, yɛ no sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ w’ani soɔ. Na Sarai tanee n’ani maa no dwane firii ne nkyɛn.
Na AWURADE bɔfoɔ hunuu no nsuo aniwa bi ho wɔ ɛserɛ so wɔ Sur kwan so nsuo aniwa no ho.
Na ɔbisaa sɛ: Hagar, Sarai afenaa, wofiri he na woreba, na worekɔ he ni? Na ɔse: Mefiri m’awuraa Sarai anim na meredwane.
Na AWURADE bɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sane kɔ w’awuraa nkyɛn, na kɔbrɛ wo ho ase ma no.
Na AWURADE bɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Dɔ na mɛma w’asefoɔ adɔ, na wɔn dodoɔ nti wɔrentumi nkan wɔn.
Na AWURADE bɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Hwɛ, woanyinsɛn, na wobɛwo ɔba,
na wobɛto ne din Ismael,
sɛ AWURADE ate w’amanehunu.
Na ɔbɛyɛ onipa a ɔte sɛ ɛserɛ so afunumu.
Ne nsa bɛtia nnipa nyinaa,
na nnipa nyinaa nsa atia no,
na ɔbɛsɔre atia ne nuanom nyinaa.

verse.content: Na ɔfrɛɛ AWURADE a ɔne no kasaeɛ no din sɛ: Wone El-roi,
na ɔse: Mahunu deɛ ɔhu me no ampa anaa?
Enti wɔfrɛ asubura no sɛ: Beer-lahai-roi,
na hwɛ, ɛwɔ Kades ne Bared ntam.
Na Hagar woo ɔba maa Abram. Abram frɛɛ ne ba a Hagar woo no no Ismael.
Na Hagar woo Ismael maa Abram no, na Abram adi mfeɛ aduɔwɔtwe nsia.

note.content: Ɔteasefoɔ a ɔhu me no abura.

verse.content: Na Abram dii mfirinhyia aduɔkron nkron no, AWURADE yii ne ho kyerɛɛ no kaa sɛ: Mene Onyankopɔn Tweaduampɔn, nante m’anim, na yɛ pɛ.
Na mɛma m’apam ada me ne wo ntam, na mama woadɔ kɛse ara.
Na Abram daa hɔ de n’anim butuu fam; na Onyankopɔn ne no kasaa sɛ:
Me deɛ, hwɛ, m’apam da hɔ ma wo, na mɛyɛ wo aman pii agya.
Na wɔremfrɛ wo din Abram
bio, na mmom wɔbɛfrɛ wo Abraham,
ɛfiri sɛ mayɛ wo aman pii agya.
Na mɛma woadɔ pii pa ara, na mɛyɛ wo aman, na ahemfo afiri wo mu.
Na mɛma me ne wo ne w’asefoɔ a ɛbɛdi w’akyire no apam agyina wɔ wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mu, na ayɛ daa apam, na mayɛ wo ne w’asefoɔ a ɛbɛdi w’akyire no Nyankopɔn.
Na mede asase a woyɛ so hɔhoɔ yi, Kanaan asase nyinaa, bɛma wo ne w’asefoɔ a ɛbɛdi w’akyire, sɛ daa agyapadeɛ, na mayɛ wɔn Nyankopɔn.
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ: Wo deɛ, di m’apam so, wo ne w’asefoɔ a ɛbɛdi w’akyi wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mu.
Yei ne me ne w’asefoɔ a ɛbɛdi w’akyire no ntam apam a monni soɔ: Wɔntwitwa mo mu mmarima nyinaa twetia.
Na montwitwa mo ho twetia, na ayɛ me ne mo ntam apam no ho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ.
Na ɔbabarima biara a wadi nna nwɔtwe no, montwa no twetia mo awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mu, deɛ wɔawo no fie ne deɛ wɔde sika tɔɔ no wɔ ɔhɔhoɔ biara a ɔnyɛ w’aseni nkyɛn.
Twa deɛ wɔawo no wɔ wo fie ne deɛ wɔde wo sika tɔɔ no twetia, na m’apam atena mo honam mu sɛ daa apam.
Na ɔbarima momonoto biara a wɔntwaa no twetia no, saa onipa no wɔbɛtwa no afiri ne man mu, ɛfiri sɛ wato m’apam.
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ: Wo yere Sarai deɛ, mfrɛ no Sarai bio, na mmom Sara.
Na mɛhyira no, na mama wo ne mu ɔba nso, ampa ara, mɛhyira no. Ɔbɛyɛ aman, na aman ahemfo bɛfiri ne mu.
Na Abraham de n’anim butuu fam seree, na ɔkaa no n’akomam sɛ: Yee! Wɔbɛwo ɔba ama deɛ wadi mfirinhyia ɔha, na Sara a wadi mfeɛ aduɔkron no bɛwo anaa?
Na Abraham ka kyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ: O, ɛnneɛ anka ma Ismael nya w’anim adom ɛ!
Na Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ: Ampaneampa, wo yere Sara bɛwo ɔba ama wo, na woato ne din Isak.
Na mɛma me ne no apam no agyina ayɛ daa apam ama n’asefoɔ a ɛbɛdi n’akyire no.
Na Ismael ho deɛ, matie wo. Hwɛ, mɛhyira no, na mama no awo, na wadɔɔso pii pa ara. Atitire dummienu na ɔbɛwoɔ, na mayɛ no ɔman kɛseɛ.
Na m’apam deɛ, me ne Isak a Sara bɛwo no ama wo afeda sɛsɛɛ no na ɛbɛpam ama no agyina.
Na ɔne no wiee kasa no, Onyankopɔn firii Abraham nkyɛn kɔɔ ɔsoro.
Na Abraham faa ne ba Ismael ne wɔn a wɔawo wɔn wɔ ne fie ne wɔn a ɔde ne sika tɔɔ wɔn nyinaa, Abraham fiefoɔ mu mmarima nyinaa, na ɔtwitwaa wɔn twetia da no ara, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no no.
Na Abraham adi mfirinhyia aduɔkron nkron na wɔtwaa no twetia.
Na ne ba Ismael adi mfeɛ dummiɛnsa na wɔtwaa no twetia.
Da no ara na wɔtwitwaa Abraham ne ne ba Ismael twetia.
Na ne fie mmarima nyinaa, wɔn a wɔwoo wɔn ne fie ne wɔn a wɔde sika totɔɔ wɔn wɔ ahɔhoɔ nkyɛn, wɔtwitwaa wɔn twetia kaa ne ho.

note.content: Ɔhene babaa. Saa nkyerɛaseɛ yi ara na wɔde ma edin Sarai.

verse.content: Na AWURADE yii ne ho kyerɛɛ Abraham wɔ Mamre pɔ mu, na ɔte ne ntomadan pono ano awia ketee.
Na ɔmaa n’ani so hwɛe, na hwɛ, mmarima baasa abɛgyina ne ntentensoɔ. Na ɔhunuu wɔn no, ɔfirii ne ntomadan pono ano tuu mmirika kɔhyiaa wɔn, na ɔbɔɔ ne mu ase
kaa sɛ: Me wura, sɛ manya w’anim adom a, mesrɛ wo, nsiane w’akoa ho nkɔ.
Ma wɔnkɔsa nsuo kakraa bi mmra, na monhohoro mo nan ase, na monhome dua yi ase.
Moanya abɛfa mo akoa nkyɛn yi, merekɔ makɔfa paanoo kakra maba, na mode adwodwo mo akoma, na ɛno akyiri no moakɔ. Na wɔse: Yɛ sɛdeɛ woaka yi.
Na Abraham yɛɛ ntɛm kɔɔ Sara nkyɛn ntomadan mu kaa sɛ: Yɛ ntɛm, fa esiam pa susukoraa mmiɛnsa, fete to taterɛ.
Na Abraham tuu mmirika kɔɔ anantwie mu kɔkyeree nantwie ba a ɔyɛ na ɔde maa ɔsomfoɔ bi, na ɔyɛɛ ntɛm siesiee no.
Na Abraham faa nufosuo ani sradeɛ ne nufosuo ne nantwie ba nam a ɔsiesiee no no, na ɔde bɛsii wɔn anim; na ɔno deɛ, ɔgyinaa wɔn nkyɛn dua no ase, maa wɔdidii.
Na wɔbisaa Abraham sɛ: Wo yere Sara wɔ he? Na ɔse: Hwɛ, ɔwɔ ntomadan mu.
Na wɔn mu baako kaa sɛ: Ampa ara, mɛsane maba wo nkyɛn afeda sɛsɛɛ no, na wo yere Sara anya ɔba. Na Sara retie no ntomadan pono a ɛwɔ n’akyire no ano.
Na Abraham ne Sara nyinaa anyininyini a wɔadi mfirinhyia pii, na deɛ ɛyɛ mmaa no to atwa wɔ Sara ho.
Enti Sara seree ne mu kaa sɛ: Sɛ manya awie aberewa bɔ na me wura nso abɔ akɔkoraa yi, na mɛnya anigyeɛ?
Na AWURADE bisaa Abraham sɛ: Adɛn nti na Sara seree sɛ: Ampaneampa ara manyini yi mɛwo ɔba?
Biribi yɛ AWURADE yɛna anaa? Berɛ a mahyɛ no, mɛsane aba wo nkyɛn afeda sɛsɛɛ no na Sara anya ɔba.
Na Sara sanee sɛ: Menseree, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔsuro. Na ɔse: Dabi, woasere.
Na mmarima no sɔre firii hɔ danee wɔn ani kyerɛɛ Sodom, na Abraham kɔgyaa wɔn kwan.
Na AWURADE kaa sɛ: Memfa deɛ merebɛyɛ yi mensie Abraham anaa?
Ɛfiri sɛ ampa ara Abraham bɛyɛ ɔman a ɛso na wɔwɔ tumi, na ne mu na wɔbɛhyira wiase aman nyinaa.
Na mahu no mayi no sɛ ɔnhyɛ ne mma ne ne fiefoɔ a ɛbɛdi n’akyire sɛ wɔnni AWURADE kwan so nyɛ tenenee ne atɛntenenee adeɛ, na AWURADE ama deɛ waka no Abraham ho no aba ne so.
Na AWURADE kaa sɛ: Ɛsiane sɛ Sodom ne Gomora so nteamu so, na wɔn nnebɔne yɛ duru dodo nti,
meresiane makɔhwɛ sɛ wɔayɛ sɛdeɛ nteamu a ɛduru me nkyɛn no teɛ no a; na sɛ ɛnte saa, mahunu.
Na mmarima no danee wɔn ani firii hɔ kɔɔ Sodom; na Abraham deɛ, na ɔda so gyina AWURADE anim ara.
Na Abraham twe bɛn bisaa sɛ: Wobɛpra ɔteneneeni ne ɔbɔnefoɔ abom agu anaa?
Sɛ ebia sɛsɛɛ ateneneefoɔ aduonum wɔ kuro no mu a, anka wobɛpra wɔn agu a ateneneefoɔ aduonum a ɛwɔ mu no nti woremfa kuro no ho nkyɛ wɔn anaa?
Yei mpare wo sɛ wobɛdi saa asɛm yi sɛ wobɛkum ɔteneneeni ne ɔdebɔneyɛni afra, na ɔteneneeni ayɛ sɛ ɔdebɔneyɛni; yei mpare wo. Deɛ ɔbu asase nyinaa atɛn no remmu atɛntenenee anaa?
Na AWURADE kaa sɛ: Sɛ mehunu ateneneefoɔ aduonum Sodom kuro mu a, wɔn nti mede kuro no nyinaa ho bɛkyɛ wɔn.
Na Abraham buaa sɛ: Hwɛ, meyɛ mfuturo ne nso deɛ, nanso masi me bo sɛ me ne AWURADE bɛkasa:
Sɛ ebia ateneneefoɔ aduonum no so te enum a; anka enum nti wobɛsɛe kuro no nyinaa anaa? Na ɔse: Sɛ mehunu aduanan nnum wɔ hɔ a, merensɛe hɔ.
Na Abraham toaa so kasa kyerɛɛ AWURADE bio sɛ: Ebia wɔbɛhunu aduanan wɔ hɔ. Na AWURADE buaa sɛ: Aduanan no nti merenyɛ.
Ɛnna ɔkaa sɛ: Mma AWURADE bo mmfu, na ma menkasa: Ebia wɔbɛhunu aduasa wɔ hɔ. Na ɔse: Sɛ mehunu aduasa wɔ hɔ a, merenyɛ.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Hwɛ, masi me bo sɛ me ne AWURADE bɛkasa. Ebia wɔbɛhunu aduonu wɔ hɔ. Na ɔse: Aduonu no nti merensɛe hɔ.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Mma AWURADE bo mmfu, na menkasa baako pɛ yi: Ebia wɔbɛhunu edu wɔ hɔ. Na ɔse: Edu no nti merensɛe hɔ.
Na AWURADE ne Abraham kasa wieeɛ no, ɔkɔe, na Abraham sane baa ne fie.
Na abɔfoɔ baanu no duruu Sodom anwummerɛ; na Lot te Sodom kuro pono ano. Na Lot hunuu wɔn no, ɔsɔre kɔhyiaa wɔn, na ɔbɔɔ ne mu ase kaa sɛ:
Me wuranom, mesrɛ mo, mommane mmra mo akoa fie mmɛsoɛ anadwo yi, na monhohoro mo nan ase, na anɔpatutu moasɔre akɔ mo kwan. Na wɔse: Dabi, yɛbɛda abɔntene so.
Na ɔsrɛɛ wɔn dendeenden. Na wɔmanee ne nkyɛn baa ne fie, na ɔtoo wɔn pono, na ɔtoo apiti maa wɔdii.
Na wɔnnya nkɔdaeɛ no, Sodom kurom hɔfoɔ bɛtwaa ɛdan no ho hyiae, ɛfiri mmɔfra so kɔsi mpanimfoɔ so, ɔman mu no nyinaa.
Na wɔfrɛɛ Lot ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Mmarima a wɔbaa wo nkyɛn anadwo yi no wɔ he? Yi wɔn brɛ yɛn, na yɛne wɔn nna.
Na Lot firi kɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn ɛpono ano, na ɔtoo ɛpono no mu wɔ n’akyi.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Anuanom, mesrɛ mo, monnyɛ bɔne saa!
Hwɛ, mewɔ mmammaa baanu a wɔnhunuu ɔbarima, momma memfa wɔn mfiri mmrɛ mo, na monyɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ mo ani soɔ na mmarima yi nko deɛ, monnyɛ wɔn hwee, na ɛno nti na wɔbaa me suhyɛ aseɛ yi.
Na wɔkaa sɛ: Twe wo ho firi hɔ! Na wɔse: Saa onipa yi ba bɛyɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, ɛnna afei ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ ɔtemmufoɔ yi! Afei yɛbɛyɛ wo bɔne akyɛne wɔn. Na wɔhyɛɛ ɔbarima Lot so denden twe baa sɛ wɔbɛbubu ɛpono no.
Na mmarima no tenee wɔn nsa twee Lot baa wɔn nkyɛn wɔ ɛdan no mu, na wɔtoo ɛpono no mu.
Na nnipa a wɔgyina ɛpono ano no deɛ, wɔfirafiraa wɔn ani firi mmɔfra so kɔsi mpanin so, na wɔhwehwɛɛ ɛpono ano kwan brɛe.
Na mmarima no ka kyerɛɛ Lot sɛ: Wowɔ obi wɔ ha ka wo ho? Aseɛ anaa mmammarima anaa mmammaa anaa biribiara a wowɔ wɔ kuro yi mu, yi wɔn firi ha,
na yɛrebɛsɛe ha, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nnebɔne ayɛ kɛse AWURADE anim, na AWURADE asoma yɛn sɛ yɛmmɛsɛe ha.
Na Lot firii adi ne ne nsenom a wɔrebɛware ne mmammaa no kɔkasaa sɛ: Monsɔre mfiri ha, na AWURADE rebɛsɛe kuro yi. Nanso ɔyɛɛ ne nsenom ani so sɛ obi a ɔredi fɛw.
Na adeɛ reyɛ akye no, abɔfoɔ no piapiaa Lot sɛ: Sɔre, fa wo yere ne wo mmammaa baanu a wɔwɔ ha no kɔ, anyɛ saa a, wɔbɛsɛe wo, ɔman yi asotwe mu.
Na ɔtwentwɛn ne nan ase no, mmarima no sosɔɔ ɔno ne ne yere ne ne mmammaa baanu no nsa, na wɔde no firii adi gyaa no kuro no akyi ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE huu no mmɔbɔ.
Na wɔde wɔn firii adie no, ɔkaa sɛ: Dwane gye wo kra nkwa, nhwɛ w’akyi, nso nnyina kanko yi mu baabiara; bepɔ so na dwane korɔ, anyɛ saa a, wɔbɛsɛe wo.
Na Lot ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: O, me wura, nnyɛ saa.
Hwɛ, w’akoa anya w’anim adom, na woama w’adɔeɛ a woayɛ me yi aso sɛ woregye me nkwa nanso merentumi nnwane nkɔ mmepɔ no so, na mmusuo no ammɛto me, na manwu.
Hwɛ, kuro yi na ɛbɛn sɛ wɔdwane kɔ hɔ, ɛhɔ sua. Ma mennwane nkɔ hɔ ɛ! Ɛnsua anaa? Na me kra anya nkwa.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ, matie wo wɔ saa asɛm yi ho nso, na meremmutu kuro a woaka ho asɛm yi.
Yɛ ntɛm dwane kɔ hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ merentumi nyɛ hwee gye sɛ woakɔduru hɔ ansa. Enti na wɔfrɛ kuro no din sɛ: Soar.
Na Lot duruu Soar no, na owia apue asase so.
Na AWURADE tɔɔ sɔfe ne ogya firi ɔsoro guu Sodom ne Gomora so.
Na ɔbutuu nkuro no ne kanko no nyinaa ne wɔn a wɔtete nkuro no mu nyinaa ne deɛ afifiri asase no soɔ.
Na Lot yere no deɛ, ɔhwɛɛ n’akyi, na ɔdanee nkyene sie.
Na Abraham tuaa ahema kɔɔ faako a na ɔgyina AWURADE anim hɔ no.
Na ɔdanee n’ani kyerɛɛ Sodom ne Gomora ne kanko no asase nyinaa, na ɔhwɛe, na hwɛ, asase no so wisie foroo sɛ fononoo mu wisie.
Enti berɛ a Onyankopɔn sɛee kanko no nkuro no no, ɔkaee Abraham, na ɔgyee Lot firii butuo a ɔbutuu nkuro a Lot te mu no mu.
Na Lot firii Soar kɔtenaa bepɔ no so, ɔne ne mmammaa baanu no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔsuroo Soar tena, na ɔne wɔn kɔtenaa ɔbodan bi mu.
Na abakan no ka kyerɛɛ akumaa no sɛ: Yɛn agya anyini, na ɔbarima biara nni asase yi so a ɔbɛba yɛn ho, sɛdeɛ asase sofoɔ nyinaa amanneɛ teɛ.
Bra, na yɛmma yɛn agya nsa nnom, na yɛne no nkɔda, na yɛanya yɛn agya ho mma.
Na wɔmaa wɔn agya nsa nomee anadwo no, na abakan no kɔɔ mu ne n’agya kɔdae; na wanhunu ne nna ne ne sɔreɛ mu.
Na adeɛ kyeeɛ no, abakan no ka kyerɛɛ akumaa no sɛ: Hwɛ, me ne m’agya akɔda anadwo yi, ma yɛmma no nsa nnom nnɛ anadwo yi nso, na kɔ mu, na wo ne no nkɔda, na yɛanya yɛn agya ho mma.
Na wɔmaa wɔn agya nsa nomee anadwo no nso, na akumaa no sɔre ne no kɔdae; na wanhunu ne nna ne ne sɔreɛ mu.
Na Lot mma maa baanu no nyinaa nyinsɛn wɔn agya ho.
Na abakan no woo ɔbabarima, na ɔtoo no din Moab; ɔne Moabfoɔ agya de bɛsi nnɛ.
Na akumaa no nso woo ɔbabarima, na ɔtoo no din Ben-ami; ɔne Amon mma agya de bɛsi nnɛ.
Na Abraham tutu firii hɔ kɔɔ Negeb asase so, na ɔkɔtenaa Kades ne Sur ntam. Na ɔkɔtenaa Gerar nso.
Ɛhɔ Abraham kaa ne yere Sara ho sɛ: Ɔyɛ me nuabaa. Na Gerar hene Abimelek soma maa wɔbɛfaa Sara.
Na Onyankopɔn baa Abimelek nkyɛn anadwo daeɛ mu, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ, ɔbaa a woakɔfa no no nti, woawu awie, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ ɔbarima bi yere.
Nso na Abimelek nnya mfaa ne ho nkaa no. Na ɔkaa sɛ: AWURADE, wobɛkum ɔman tenenee nso?
Ɛnyɛ ɔno na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Me nua ne no? Na ɔbaa no nso kaa sɛ: Me nua ne no. M’akomam kann ne me tirim fitaa na mede meyɛɛ yei.
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no daeɛ mu sɛ: Me nso menim sɛ w’akomam kann na wode yɛɛ yei, na me nso mesɔɔ wo mu, na woanyɛ bɔne, ɛno nti na mamma woamfa wo ho anka no no.
Na afei dane ɔbarima no yere kɔma no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ odiyifoɔ, na wapa kyɛw ama wo, na woanya nkwa; na sɛ woannane no ankɔma no a, ɛnneɛ, hunu sɛ wuo na wobɛwuo, wo ne deɛ ɛwɔ woɔ nyinaa.
Na Abimelek sɔree anɔpatutu frɛɛ ne nkoa nyinaa, na ɔkaa nsɛm yi nyinaa guu wɔn aso mu, na nnipa no suroo pii.
Na Abimelek frɛɛ Abraham ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na woayɛ yɛn yi, na bɔne bɛn na mayɛ woɔ, na wode bɔne kɛseɛ yi aba me ne m’ahennie soɔ? Adeɛ a wɔnyɛ na woayɛ me yi.
Na Abimelek ka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na wohunuiɛ na wodii saa asɛm yi?
Na Abraham kaa sɛ: Ɛfiri sɛ mesusuu sɛ, ampa Onyankopɔn ho suro nni ha yi, na me yere nti wɔbɛku me.
Nanso ɛwom ampa sɛ ɔyɛ me nua; m’agya ba ne no, na ɛnyɛ me na ba a; na wayɛ me yere.
Na Onyankopɔn maa mefirii m’agya fie mebɛkyiniiɛ no, mesee ɔbaa no sɛ: W’adɔeɛ a wobɛyɛ me ne sɛ, baabiara a yɛbɛduro no, ka no me ho sɛ: Ɔyɛ me nua.
Ɛnna Abimelek faa nnwan ne anantwie ne nkoa ne mfenaa de maa Abraham, na ɔdanee ne yere Sara maa no.
Na Abimelek kaa sɛ: Hwɛ, m’asase na ɛda w’anim yi, baabiara a ɛyɛ wɔ w’ani soɔ no, tena.
Na Sara deɛ, ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ, mama wo nua nnwetɛbena apem, hwɛ, ɛno na wɔn a wɔka wo ho nyinaa de bɛhunu wo tirim, na wo ho afi nnipa nyinaa anim.
Na Abraham bɔɔ Onyankopɔn mpaeɛ, na Onyankopɔn saa Abimelek ne ne yere ne ne mfenaa yadeɛ maa wɔwowoe.
Ɛsiane Abraham yere Sara ho asɛm no nti, na AWURADE ato Abimelek fiefoɔ mmaa nyinaa yafunu mu.
Na AWURADE bɛhwɛɛ Sara sɛdeɛ ɔkaeɛ no, na ɔyɛɛ Sara sɛdeɛ ɔhyɛɛ no bɔ no.
Na Sara nyinsɛnee, na ɔwoo ɔbabarima maa Abraham wɔ ne nkɔkoraaberɛ mu, berɛ a Onyankopɔn kaa ne ho asɛm no mu.
Abraham too ɔba a Sara wo maa no no din Isak.
Na Abraham ba Isak dii nnawɔtwe no, ɔtwaa no twetia sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ no no.
Na Abraham adi mfirinhyia ɔha berɛ a wɔwoo ne ba Isak maa no no.
Na Sara kaa sɛ: Onyankopɔn ama me sereɛ, obiara a ɔbɛteɛ no bɛsere ama me.
Na ɔse: Hwan na anka ɔbɛka akyerɛ Abraham sɛ Sara bɛma mma nufoɔ? Nanso hwɛ, mawo ba ama no ne nkɔkoraaberɛ mu.
Na abɔfra no nyinii, na wɔtwaa no nufoɔ. Na da a wɔtwaa Isak nufoɔ no, Abraham too pono kɛseɛ.
Na Sara hunuu Misraimni Hagar ba a ɔwo maa Abraham no sɛ ɔredi fɛw.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ: Pamo afenaa yi ne ne ba no, na ɛnyɛ afenaa yi ba ne me ba Isak na ɛbɛdi adeɛ.
Na ne ba no nti, asɛm no yɛɛ Abraham ya yie.
Na Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ: Mma abɔfra no ne w’afenaa asɛm no nnyɛ wo ya, na deɛ Sara ka kyerɛɛ woɔ nyinaa, tie, na Isak mu na wɔbɛfrɛ w’asefoɔ.
Na afenaa ba no nso, mɛyɛ no ɔman kɛseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ w’aseni.
Na Abraham sɔree anɔpatutu faa aduane ne nsuo kotokuo, na ɔde maa Hagar, ɔde sii ne kɔn ho, na ɔmaa no ne abɔfra no kɔe. Na ɔkɔe kɔkyinkyinii Beer-seba
serɛ so.
Na nsuo no saa wɔ kotokuo no mu no, ɔgyaa abɔfra no too dɔtɔ bi ase.
Ɛnna ɔkɔ kɔtenaa akyiri bɛyɛ sɛ deɛ wɔto bɛmma a ɛbɛtɔ, na ɔse: Mma mennhunu abɔfra yi wuo! Na ɔtenaa ne ntentensoɔ, na ɔmaa ne nne so sui.
Na Onyankopɔn tee abarimaa no nne, na Nyankopɔn bɔfoɔ firi soro frɛɛ Hagar bisaa no sɛ: Hagar, ɛdeɛn na ɛreyɛ woɔ? Nsuro, na Onyankopɔn ate abarimaa no nne wɔ deɛ ɔwɔ hɔ.
Sɔre ma abarimaa no so, na fa wo nsa sɔ ne mu; na mɛyɛ no ɔman kɛseɛ.
Na Onyankopɔn buee n’ani, na ɔhunuu subura bi, na ɔkɔ kɔsaa bi hyɛɛ nsuo kotokuo no ma, na ɔde bi maa abarimaa no nomee.
Na Onyankopɔn dii abarimaa no akyi, na ɔnyinii, na ɔtenaa ɛserɛ so hɔ yɛɛ agyantoni.
Na ɔtenaa Paran serɛ so; na ne na kɔwaree yerɛ firi Misraim asase so brɛɛ no.
Na berɛ no mu no, Abimelek ne ne safohene Pikol bɛka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ: Onyankopɔn di w’akyi wɔ biribiara a woyɛ mu.
Enti afei ka Onyankopɔn ntam kyerɛ me sɛ worentwa me ne me mma ne me mmanana nkontompo, na sɛ adɔeɛ a meyɛɛ woɔ no teɛ no, wode bi bɛyɛ me ne m’asase a woabɛyɛ hɔhoɔ wɔ soɔ yi.
Na Abraham kaa sɛ: Mɛka ntam no.
Na asubura bi a Abimelek nkoa nam aniɛden so gyeeɛ no nti, Abraham kaa Abimelek anim.
Na Abimelek kaa sɛ: Mennim deɛ ɔyɛɛ saa adeɛ yi, na wo nso, woanka ankyerɛ me, nanso mentee da, gye nnɛ.
Na Abraham de nnwan ne anantwie maa Abimelek, na wɔn baanu pamee.
Na Abraham yii nnwanten mma abereɛ nson gyinaa fa.
Na Abimelek bisaa Abraham sɛ: Nnwanten mma abereɛ nson a woyii wɔn gyinaa fa yi aseɛ ne sɛn?
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Nnwanten mma abereɛ nson yi, gye wɔ me nsam, na ɛnyɛ me adanseɛ sɛ me na metuu abura yi.
Enti ɔfrɛɛ hɔ Beer-seba, ɛfiri sɛ ɛhɔ na wɔn baanu nyinaa kekaa ntam.
Na wɔpamee wɔ Beer-seba; na Abimelek ne ne safohene Pikol sɔree, na wɔsane kɔɔ Filistifoɔ asase so.
Na Abraham duaa ɛsɛnteɛ dua wɔ Beer-seba, na ɔsɔree AWURADE a ɔyɛ daa Nyankopɔn no wɔ hɔ.
Na Abraham yɛɛ ɔhɔhoɔ Filistifoɔ asase so nna pii.
Na nsɛm yi akyiri no, Onyankopɔn sɔɔ Abraham hwɛe, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Abraham! Na ɔse: Menie.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Fa wo ba, wo ba korɔ a wodɔ no, Isak, kɔ Moria asase so, na fa no kɔbɔ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ wɔ hɔ, wɔ mmepɔ no mu baako a mɛkyerɛ woɔ so.
Na Abraham sɔree anɔpatutu, na ɔhyehyɛɛ n’afunumu, na ɔfaa n’asomfoɔ mu baanu ne ne ba Isak kaa ne ho, na ɔtwaa ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ nnyina, na ɔsii mu kɔɔ faako a Onyankopɔn kyerɛɛ no no.
Na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, Abraham maa n’ani so, na ɔhunuu beaeɛ hɔ wɔ akyirikyiri.
Na Abraham ka kyerɛɛ ne somfoɔ no sɛ: Mo ne afunumu yi ntena ha; na me ne abarimaa yi bɛkɔ nohoa akɔsɔre, na yɛasane aba mo nkyɛn.
Na Abraham faa ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ nnyina no de soaa ne ba Isak, na ɔfaa ogya ne sekan kurae, na wɔn baanu kɔe.
Na Isak ka kyerɛɛ n’agya Abraham sɛ: M’agya! Na ɔse: Menie, me ba. Na ɔse: Hwɛ, ogya ne nnyina nie, na adwammaa a wɔde rekɔbɔ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ no wɔ he?
Na Abraham se: Me ba, Onyankopɔn ankasa bɛkyerɛ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ adwammaa no. Na wɔn baanu kɔe.
Na wɔkɔduruu deɛ Onyankopɔn kyerɛɛ no hɔ, na Abraham sii afɔrebukyia wɔ hɔ, na ɔsiesiee nnyina no, na ɔkyekyeree ne ba Isak, na ɔde no too afɔrebukyia no so wɔ nnyina no so.
Afei Abraham tenee ne nsa faa sekan no sɛ ɔde rebɛkum ne ba no.
Na AWURADE bɔfoɔ firi soro frɛɛ no sɛ: Abraham, Abraham! Na ɔse: Menie.
Na ɔse: Mfa wo nsa nka abarimaa no, nso nyɛ no hwee. Afei na mahunu sɛ wosuro Onyankopɔn, na woankame me wo ba korɔ no.
Na Abraham maa n’ani so, na ɔhunuu odwennini a dɔtɔ asɔ ne mmɛn mu wɔ n’akyi. Na Abraham kɔfaa odwennini no de no sii ne ba no ananmu bɔɔ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ.
Na Abraham too bea hɔ din sɛ: Yahwe-yir’e.
Enti wɔka no nnɛ ara sɛ: AWURADE bepɔ so na wɔbɛhwɛ.
Na AWURADE bɔfoɔ firi soro frɛɛ Abraham bio sɛ:
Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Ɛsiane sɛ woayɛ saa asɛm yi, na woankame me wo ba korɔ no nti, maka me ho ntam sɛ:
Hyira na mɛhyira woɔ, na dɔ na mɛma w’asefoɔ adɔre sɛ ɔsoro nsoromma ne mpoano anwea. Na w’asefoɔ bɛfa wɔn atamfoɔ nkuro ano apono adi so.
Na w’asefoɔ mu na wɔbɛhyira asase so amanaman nyinaa, ɛfiri sɛ woatie me nne.
Ɛnna Abraham sane baa ne mmeranteɛ no nkyɛn, na wɔsɔre sii mu baa Beer-seba. Na Abraham tenaa Beer-seba.
Na nsɛm yi akyiri no, wɔka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ: Hwɛ, Milka nso awo mma ama wo nua Nahor:
N’abakan Us ne ne nua Bus ne Kemuel a ɔyɛ Aram agya,
ne Kesed ne Haso ne Pildas ne Yidlaf ne Betuel.
Na Betuel woo Rebeka. Nnipa baawɔtwe yi na Milka wo maa Abraham nua Nahor.
Na ne mpena baako bi a wɔfrɛ no Rehuma nso woo Teba, Gaham, Tahas ne Maaka.
Na Sara nkwa nna a ɔdiiɛ nyinaa yɛ mfirinhyia ɔha aduonu nson.
Na Sara wuu wɔ Kiriat-arba, (ɛne Hebron) a ɛwɔ Kanaan asase soɔ no. Na Abraham ba bɛsuu Sara abia; ɔsuu no.
Na Abraham sɔre firii n’amu no anim, na ɔne Het mma kɔkasaa sɛ:
Meyɛ mo nkyɛn hɔhoɔ ne mamfrani, momma me amusiebea wɔ mo nkyɛn, na mensie m’amu yi ma no mfiri m’ani so.
Na Het mma no buaa Abraham see no sɛ:
Owura, tie yɛn! Okunini bi ne wo wɔ yɛn mu. Yɛn ada mu deɛ wopɛ no, sie w’amu no wɔ mu. Yɛn mu biara renkame wo ne da, sɛ nsie w’amu wɔ mu.
Na Abraham sɔre gyinae, na ɔbɔɔ ne mu ase maa asase no so nkurɔfoɔ, Het mma no,
na ɔne wɔn kasaa sɛ: Sɛ ɛyɛ mo pɛ sɛ mesie m’amu yi ma no firi m’ani so a, montie me, na monsrɛ Efron, Sohar ba, mma me,
na ɔmfa Makpela bodan a ɛyɛ ne deɛ, na ɛwɔ n’afuo ano no mma me; ɔnnye me n’abotene na ɔmfa mma me, na mennya asieeɛ wɔ mo ha.
Na Efron te Het mma no mu. Na Hetini Efron buaa Abraham maa Het mma no tee wɔ wɔn a wɔhyɛne ne kuro pono mu no nyinaa anim sɛ:
Dabi, me wura, tie me: Mede afuo no mema wo, na ɔbodan a ɛwɔ mu no nso mede mema wo. Me man mma anim na mede ma woɔ yi, sie w’amu.
Na Abraham bɔɔ ne mu ase wɔ asase no so nkurɔfoɔ no anim,
na ɔkasa kyerɛɛ Efron maa asase no so nkurɔfoɔ no tee sɛ: Sɛ wotie me a, mede afuo no tiri dwetɛ bɛma wo; gye no me nsam, na mensie m’amu wɔ hɔ.
Na Efron buaa Abraham see no sɛ:
Me wura, tie, nnwetɛbena ahanan asase yɛ deɛn wɔ me ne wo ntam? W’amu ara na sie.
Na Abraham tiee Efron, na Abraham karii dwetɛ a Efron bɔɔ din maa Het mma teeɛ no maa no, nnwetɛbena ahanan a adwadifoɔ die no.
Na wɔde Efron afuo a ɛwɔ Makpela a ɛda Mamre ntentensoɔ no, afuo no ne ɔbodan a ɛwɔ mu no ne afuo no so nnua nyinaa, deɛ ɛwɔ n’ahyeɛ nyinaa soɔ,
hyɛɛ Abraham nsa wɔ Het mma no anim, wɔn a wɔhyɛne ne kuro pono mu no nyinaa anim.
Na ɛno akyiri no, Abraham siee ne yere Sara wɔ Makpela afuo mu ɔbodan mu, wɔ Mamre ntentensoɔ, (a ɛne Hebron) a ɛwɔ Kanaan asase soɔ no.
Na Het mma de afuo no ne ɔbodan a ɛwɔ mu no hyɛɛ Abraham nsa sɛ amusiebea.
Na Abraham abɔ akɔkoraa, na wadi nna pii, na AWURADE ahyira no ade nyinaa mu.
Na Abraham ka kyerɛɛ ne fie asomfoɔ mu panin a ɔhwɛ deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa soɔ sɛ: Fa wo nsa ka m’asene mu,
na mɛma woaka AWURADE, ɔsoro Nyankopɔn ne asase Nyankopɔn, ntam sɛ worenware Kanaanfoɔ a mete wɔn mu yi mmammaa mu bi mma me ba.
Na kɔ me kuro ne m’abusua mu kɔware yerɛ ma me ba Isak.
Na ɔsomfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ebia ɔbaa no rempɛ sɛ ɔbɛdi m’akyiri aba asase yi soɔ; ɛnneɛ memfa wo ba no mensane menkɔ asase a wofiri so baeɛ no so anaa?
Na Abraham ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ yie, na woamfa me ba ansane ankɔ hɔ bio.

AWURADE, ɔsoro Nyankopɔn a ɔfaa me firii m’agya fie ne asase a wɔwoo me wɔ soɔ no so, na ɔne me kasaeɛ, na ɔkaa ntam kyerɛɛ me sɛ: W’asefoɔ na mede asase yi bɛma wɔn no, ɔbɛsoma ne bɔfoɔ adi w’anim, na woakɔware yerɛ afiri hɔ abrɛ me ba.
Na sɛ ɔbaa no mpɛ sɛ ɔdi w’akyiri a, ɛnneɛ wo ho afi me ntam yi mu, nanso mfa me ba nsane nkɔ hɔ bio.
Na ɔsomfoɔ no de ne nsa kaa ne wura Abraham asene mu, na ɔkaa no ntam wɔ asɛm no ho.
Na ɔsomfoɔ no faa ne wura yoma mu du, na ɔkɔe, na ɔkura ne wura nnepa ahodoɔ nyinaa bi. Na ɔsɔre sii mu kɔɔ Mesopotamia, Nahor kuro mu.
Na ɔmaa ne yoma no butuu kuro no kurotia wɔ asubura bi ho anwummerɛ a mmaa bɛsa nsuo.
Na ɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ sɛ: AWURADE, me wura Abraham Nyankopɔn, mesrɛ wo, ma no nsi me yie nnɛ, na yɛ me wura Abraham adɔeɛ.
Hwɛ, meregyina asubura yi so ha; na kurom hɔfoɔ mmammaa bɛfiri abɛsa nsuo.

Na ma no mmra sɛ ababaa a mɛse no sɛ: Soɛ w’ahina ma mennom nsuo no bi, na ɔbɛka sɛ: Nom, na mɛma wo yoma no anom bie no, ma ɔno ara nyɛ deɛ woayi no ama w’akoa Isak, na ɛno mu na mɛhunu sɛ woayɛ me wura adɔeɛ.
Na ɔnnya nwiee kasa no, hwɛ, Rebeka baeɛ a n’ahina si ne batiri so. Ɔyɛ Betuel a ɔyɛ Abraham ne nua Nahor yere Milka ba.
Na ababaa no ho yɛ fɛ sɛ, ɔyɛ ɔbaabunu ɛfiri sɛ na ɔbarima biara nhunuu no da. Na ɔkɔɔ asubura no mu kɔhyɛɛ n’ahina ma, na ɔbae.
Na ɔsomfoɔ no tuu mmirika kɔhyiaa no sɛ: Mesrɛ wo, ma mennom w’ahina yi mu nsuo kakra.
Na ɔse: Me wura, nom bi! Na ɔyɛɛ ntɛm soɛɛ n’ahina no sii ne nsam maa no nomee.
Na ɔmaa no nom wieeɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ: Mɛkɔ makɔsa bi mabrɛ wo yoma no nso akɔsi sɛ wɔbɛwie nom.
Na ɔyɛɛ ntɛm kɔhwiee n’ahina mu nsuo no guu anomeeɛ hɔ, na ɔtutuu mmirika kɔɔ abura no mu bio kɔsaa nsuo, na ɔsa maa ne yoma no nyinaa.
Na ɔbarima no hwɛɛ no ara, na ɔyɛɛ komm sɛ ɔbɛhunu sɛ AWURADE ama ne kwankorɔ no ayɛ dwoodwoo anaasɛ ɛnte saa.
Na yoma no wiee nsuo nom no, ɔbarima no yii sika hwenemkaa a ano si dwetɛbena fa ne nsa so nkapo mmienu a ano si sikabena du de hyɛɛ no.
Na ɔbisaa no sɛ: Hwan ba ne wo? Mesrɛ wo, kyerɛ me! Yɛbɛnya daberɛ wɔ w’agya fie anaa?
Na ɔbuaa no sɛ: M’agya ne Betuel a ɔyɛ Nahor ne Milka ba no.
Na ɔtoaa so sɛ: Yɛwɔ ɛserɛ ne mmoa aduane pii ne deɛ mobɛda.
Na ɔbarima no bɔɔ ne mu ase sɔree AWURADE.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Nhyira nka AWURADE, me wura Abraham Nyankopɔn a wamma n’adɔeɛ ne ne nokorɛ ammɔ me wura. Na me nso, AWURADE akyerɛ me me wura nuanom fie kwan.
Na ababaa no tuu mmirika kɔkaa saa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ ne na fiefoɔ.
Na Rebeka wɔ nuabarima bi a ne din de Laban. Na Laban de mmirika firii adi kɔɔ ɔbarima no nkyɛn wɔ asubura no ho.
Na ɔhunuu hwenemkaa ne ne nsa so nkapo no, na ɔtee ne nua Rebeka nsɛm no sɛ: Sɛdeɛ ɔbarima no kasa kyerɛɛ me nie no, ɔbaa ɔbarima no nkyɛn. Na hwɛ, na ɔgyina yoma no nkyɛn, asubura no ho.
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Wo a AWURADE ahyira woɔ, bra, adɛn nti na wogyina kurotia? Na masiesie ɛdan mu, ne baabi nso mama yoma no.
Na ɔbarima no kɔɔ fie, na ɔyii yoma no so nnoɔma maa no ɛserɛ ne aduane, na ɔmaa ɔno ne nnipa a wɔka ne ho no nsuo sɛ wɔnhohoro wɔn nan ase.
Na wɔde aduane bɛsii n’anim sɛ ɔnni. Nanso ɔkaa sɛ: Merennidi gye sɛ mabɔ m’amanneɛ ansa. Na ɔse: Bɔ na yɛn ntie ɛ!
Na ɔse: Abraham somfoɔ ne me.
Na AWURADE ahyira me wura pii na wayɛ ɔkɛseɛ. Na wama no nnwan ne anantwie, dwetɛ ne sika kɔkɔɔ, nkoa ne mfenaa, ne yoma ne mfunumu.
Na me wura yere Sara awo ba wɔ ne mmerewaberɛ mu ama me wura, na ɔde deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa ama no.
Na me wura ama maka ntam sɛ: Nware Kanaanfoɔ a mete wɔn asase soɔ yi mmammaa mu bi mma me ba.
Na mmom kɔ m’agya fie ne m’abusua mu kɔware yerɛ brɛ no.
Na mebisaa me wura sɛ: Na sɛ ɔbaa no anni m’akyi ɛ?
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: AWURADE a menam n’anim no bɛsoma ne bɔfoɔ aka wo ho, na wama wo kwan so ayɛ dwoodwoo, na woakɔware yerɛ wɔ m’abusua mu ne m’agya fie abrɛ me ba;
Ɛno na sɛ wokɔ m’abusua mu, na wɔamma wo bi a, ɛnneɛ na wo ho afi me ntam no mu.
Na mebaa asubura no ho nnɛ kaa sɛ: AWURADE, me wura Abraham Nyankopɔn, sɛ wo ara worema me kwan a meretuo yi ayɛ dwoodwoo a,
hwɛ, megyina asubura yi ho, na ma no mmra sɛ ababaa a ɔbɛfiri abɛsa nsuo no, na mɛse no sɛ: Mesrɛ wo, ma me w’ahina yi mu nsuo kakra mennom,
na ɔbɛka akyerɛ me sɛ: Nom, na menkɔsa bi memmrɛ wo yoma no nso no, ma ɔno ara nyɛ ɔbaa a AWURADE ayi no ama me wura ba.
Na mennya menwiee m’akoma mu kasa no, hwɛ, Rebeka firii adi bae a ahina si ne mmatiri soɔ, na ɔkɔɔ abura no mu kɔsaa nsuo. Na mesee no sɛ: Mesrɛ wo, ma me bi mennom.
Na ɔyɛɛ ntɛm soɛɛ n’ahina no kaa sɛ: Nom, na mɛma wo yoma no nso bi anom. Na menomee, na ɔmaa yoma no nso bi nomee.
Na mebisaa no sɛ: Hwan ba ne wo? Na ɔse: M’agya ne Betuel a ɔyɛ Nahor ne Milka ba no. Na mede ɛhwenemkaa no mesɛnee ne hwenem, na mede nkapo no mehyehyɛɛ ne nsa,
na mebɔɔ me mu ase mesɔree AWURADE, na mehyiraa AWURADE, me wura Abraham Nyankopɔn a ɔkyerɛɛ me nokorɛ kwan sɛ menkɔware me wura nua ba memma ne ba no.
Na afei sɛ mo ara moreyɛ me wura adɔeɛ adi no nokorɛ a, monka nkyerɛ me; na sɛ ɛnte saa a, monka nkyerɛ me, na mennane memfa nifa anaa benkum.
Ɛnna Laban ne Betuel buaa sɛ: AWURADE na asɛm yi firi no, yɛrentumi nka no papa anaa bɔne nkyerɛ wo.
Hwɛ, Rebeka na ɔgyina w’anim yi, fa no kɔ ma no nkɔyɛ wo wura ba yere, sɛdeɛ AWURADE aka no.
Na Abraham somfoɔ no tee wɔn nsɛm no, ɔkotoo fam sɔree AWURADE.
Na ɔsomfoɔ no yii dwetɛ nnwinneɛ ne sika kɔkɔɔ nnwinneɛ ne ntadeɛ de maa Rebeka; na ɔde nnoɔma a ɛsom boɔ maa ne nuabarima ne ne na.
Na ɔne nnipa a wɔka ne ho no didii na wɔnomeeɛ no, wɔdaa hɔ anadwo no. Na wɔsɔree anɔpa no, ɔkaa sɛ: Monnya me kwan, na menkɔ me wura nkyɛn.
Na ne nua ne ne na kaa sɛ: Ma ababaa no ntena yɛn nkyɛn nna tiaa bi sɛ dadu ansa na woakɔ.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monnsi me kwan, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE ama m’akwantuo no asi me yie. Monnya me kwan mma menkɔ me wura nkyɛn.
Na wɔse: Ma yɛmfrɛ ababaa no mmisa ɔno ara.
Na wɔfrɛɛ Rebeka ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wo ne ɔbarima yi bɛkɔ anaa? Na ɔse: Mɛkɔ.
Na wɔgyaa wɔn nua Rebeka ne n’abaawa panin ne Abraham somfoɔ no ne ne nnipa no kwan.
Na wɔhyiraa Rebeka see no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Yɛn nuabaa, dane
mpem du ahodoɔ mpem mpem,
na w’asefoɔ mfa
wɔn atamfoɔ apono nni.

verse.content: Na Rebeka ne ne mmaawa sɔree, na wɔtenatenaa yoma so dii ɔbarima no akyi, na ɔsomfoɔ no de Rebeka sii mu kɔe.
Na Isak firi Lahai-roi abura ho bae, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔte Negeb asase no so.
Na Isak firii adi kɔɔ wiram anwummerɛ kɔdwennwenee ne nsɛm ho. Na ɔmaa n’ani so hwɛe, na hwɛ, yoma reba.
Na Rebeka maa n’ani so, na ɔhunuu Isak no, ɔfirii yoma no so sii fam.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔsomfoɔ no sɛ: Ɔbarima bɛn na ɔnam wira mu rebɛhyia yɛn yi? Na ɔsomfoɔ no se: Ɛyɛ me wura. Na ɔfaa ne nkatanimu de kataa n’anim.
Na ɔsomfoɔ no kaa deɛ ɔyɛeɛ no nyinaa kyerɛɛ Isak.
Na Isak de no kɔɔ ne na Sara ntomadan mu, na ɔwaree Rebeka, na ɔyɛɛ no ɛyerɛ, na ɔdɔ no. Na Isak werɛ kyekyeree, ne na wuo no akyi.
Na Abraham waree yerɛ bio a ne din de Ketura.
Na ɔwoo Simran, Yoksan, Medan, Midian, Isbak ne Sua maa no.
Na Yoksan woo Seba ne Dedan. Na Dedan mma ne Asurfoɔ, Letusfoɔ ne Leumfoɔ.
Na Midian mma ne Hefa, Hefer, Hanok, Abida ne Eldaa. Yeinom nyinaa ne Ketura mma.
Na Abraham de deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa maa Isak.
Na mmaa nkae mma a Abraham wɔ no deɛ, berɛ a Abraham te aseɛ no, ɔkyɛɛ wɔn adeɛ, na ɔgyaa wɔn kwan firii ne ba Isak ho maa wɔkɔɔ apueeɛ asase no so.
Na Abraham nna a ɔdiiɛ yɛ mfeɛ ɔha aduɔson nnum.
Na Abraham gyaa ne honhom mu, na ɔwuu ɛdwono pa mu, wabɔ akɔkoraa, na ɔnyaa mfeɛ pii. Na ɔtii n’agyanom wɔ asamando.
Na ne mma Isak ne Ismael siee no Makpela bodan mu, wɔ Hetini Efron, Sohar ba, afuo no mu wɔ Mamre ntentensoɔ,
afuo a Abraham tɔɔ no Het mma nsam no. Ɛhɔ na wɔsiee Abraham ne ne yere Sara.
Na Abraham wuo akyiri no, Onyankopɔn hyiraa ne ba Isak. Na Isak tenaa Lahai-roi abura no ho.
Na yei ne Abraham ba Ismael a Misraimni Hagar, Sara afenaa no, wo maa Abraham no awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ:
Na yei ne Ismael mma din a wɔde frɛɛ wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ no: Ismael abakan Nebaiot. Wɔn a wɔka ho ne Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Misma, Duma, Masa,
Hadad, Tema, Yetur, Nafis ne Kedema.
Yeinom ne Ismael mma, na yeinom ne wɔn din, sɛdeɛ wɔn nkuraa ne wɔn nsraban teɛ, atitire dummienu ne wɔn aman.
(Na Ismael nkwa mu mfeɛ a ɔdiiɛ nie: Mfirinhyia ɔha aduasa nson. Na ɔgyaa ne honhom mu, na ɔwui, na ɔtii n’agyanom wɔ asamando.)
Na wɔtena firi Hawila kɔsii Sur a ɛwɔ Misraim ntentensoɔ de rekɔ Asiria no. Na ɔne ne nuanom antena no asomdwoeɛ mu.
Na yeinom ne Abraham ba Isak awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ: Abraham woo Isak.
Na Isak dii mfirinhyia aduanan no, ɔwaree Rebeka, Aramni Betuel ba a ɔfiri Mesopotamia no ne Aramni Laban nua.
Na Isak srɛɛ AWURADE maa ne yere, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔyɛ obonini. Na AWURADE tiee n’adesrɛ no, na ne yere Rebeka nyinsɛnee.
Na nkɔkoaa no pempem wɔn ho wɔ ne yam. Na ɔse: Sɛ ɛte saa a, na mete ase reyɛ deɛn? Na ɔkɔbisaa AWURADE.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Aman mmienu na ɛwɔ wo yam,
na nkurɔfoɔ ahodoɔ mmienu na ɛbɛtete wɔn ho mu afiri wo yafunu mu.
Na ɔman no baako bɛdi baako so,
na ɔpanin no bɛsom akumaa no.

verse.content: Na ne nna duruu so sɛ ɔbɛwoɔ no, na hwɛ, nta wɔ ne yam.
Na deɛ ɔdi kan firi baeɛ no, na ne ho yɛ kɔɔ, ne ho nyinaa wɔ enwi kusuu. Enti wɔtoo no din Esau.
Na ɛno akyiri no, ne nua no firi bae, na ne nsa kura Esau nantin, enti wɔtoo no din Yakob.
Na wɔwoo wɔn no, na Isak adi mfeɛ aduosia.
Na mmɔfra no nyinii. Na Esau nim ahayɔ yie, na ɔyɛ ɔhamuni, na Yakob deɛ na ɔyɛ onipa a ɔmpɛ kasa a daa ɔte ntomadan mu.
Na Isak dɔ Esau, ɛfiri sɛ na ne hanam yɛ no dɛ; na Rebeka deɛ, ɔdɔ Yakob.
Yakob noaa aduane bi, na Esau firi wiram baeɛ no, na wabrɛ.
Na Esau ka kyerɛɛ Yakob sɛ: Ma me adeɛ kɔkɔɔ yi bi menni ɛ, na mabrɛ. (Enti wɔde too no din Edom
Na Yakob kaa sɛ: Tɔn wo panin ma me nnɛ.
Na Esau kaa sɛ: Hwɛ, wuo na merebɛwuo yi, na ɔpanin yi bɛyɛ me deɛn?
Na Yakob kaa sɛ: Ka ntam kyerɛ me nnɛ. Na ɔkaa ntam kyerɛɛ no tɔn ne panin maa Yakob.
Ɛnna Yakob maa Esau paanoo ne asedua a wanoa; na ɔdii, na ɔdidi nomee, na ɔsɔre kɔe. Na sɛdeɛ Esau ammu ne panin ne no.

note.content: Yei yɛ nkyerɛaseɛ a ebinom de ama. Hebri nkyerɛaseɛ no mu nna hɔ papa.

verse.content: Na ɛkɔm baa asase no so, ɛsono ɛkɔm a ɛbaa Abraham berɛ soɔ no. Na Isak kɔɔ Filistifoɔ hene Abimelek nkyɛn wɔ Gerar.
Na AWURADE yii ne ho kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Nsiane nkɔ Misraim, tena asase a mɛkyerɛ woɔ yi so.
Tena asase yi so sɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, na mɛdi w’akyi na mahyira wo, ɛfiri sɛ wo ne w’asefoɔ na mede nsase yi nyinaa bɛma mo, na mɛma ntam a mekaa w’agya Abraham no agyina.
Na mɛma w’asefoɔ adɔre sɛ ɔsoro nsoromma, na mede nsase yi nyinaa bɛma w’asefoɔ, na w’asefoɔ mu na wɔbɛhyira asase so amanaman nyinaa,
ɛfiri sɛ Abraham tiee me nne, na ɔdii me nsiesieeɛ, me mmara nsɛm, m’ahyɛdeɛ ne me mmara so.
Na Isak tenaa Gerar.
Na ɛhɔfoɔ no bisaa no ne yere ho asɛm no, ɔkaa sɛ: Me nua ne no. Na ɔsuro sɛ ɔbɛka sɛ: Me yere ne no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔse: Anyɛ saa a, Rebeka nti ɛhafoɔ bɛku me; ɛfiri sɛ ne ho yɛ fɛ.
Na ɔkyɛree hɔ no, Filistifoɔ hene Abimelek hwɛɛ mpomma mu hunui, na hwɛ, Isak ne ne yere Rebeka rewewe.
Na Abimelek frɛɛ Isak sɛ: Hwɛ, ampa ara ɔyɛ wo yere, na ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wose: Ɔyɛ me nua yi? Na Isak ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɛfiri sɛ medwenee sɛ: Anyɛ saa a, ne nti mɛwu.
Na Abimelek kaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na woayɛ yɛn yi? Ɛkaa kumaa bi na anka ɔman yi muni bi ne wo yere dae, na anka wode mmusuo aba yɛn so.
Na Abimelek hyɛɛ ne nkurɔfoɔ nyinaa sɛ: Deɛ ɔbɛka ɔbarima yi anaa ne yere no, wuo na ɔbɛwuo.
Na Isak duaa mfudeɛ wɔ asase no so, na ɔnyaa nnɔbaeɛ mmɔho ɔha; afirinhyia no ara mu ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE hyiraa no.
Na Isak nyaa ne ho, na ɔkɔɔ so ara nyaa ne ho kɔsii sɛ ɔyɛɛ kɛseɛ pa ara.
Na ɔnyaa nnwankuo ne anantwikuo ne nkoa pii. Na Filistifoɔ no ani beree no.
(Na nsubura a n’agya Abraham nkoa tutuu no n’agya berɛ soɔ no, Filistifoɔ sisii ne nyinaa de dɔteɛ hyehyɛɛ no mama.)
Na Abimelek ka kyerɛɛ Isak sɛ: Firi yɛn nkyɛn kɔ, na wowɔ tumi dodo sene yɛn.
Na Isak sii mu firi hɔ kɔsisii ne ntomadan wɔ Gerar bonhwa mu, na ɔtenaa hɔ.
Na Isak sane tetee nsubura a n’agya Abraham berɛ so wɔtutuiɛ a Abraham wuo akyi Filistifoɔ sisii no no mu. Na ɔtotoo no din sɛdeɛ n’agya totoeɛ no ara.
Na Isak nkoa funuu bonhwa no mu, na wɔhunuu nsupa abura wɔ hɔ.
Na Gerar mmoahwɛfoɔ ne Isak mmoahwɛfoɔ dii so aperepereɛ kaa sɛ: Nsuo no yɛ yɛn dea! Enti Isak too abura no din Esek,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔne no hamee.
Na wɔtuu asubura foforɔ, na ɛno ho nso wɔpereperee, enti ɔfrɛɛ no Sitna.
Na wɔfirii hɔ kɔtuu abura foforɔ, na ɛno deɛ, wɔampere, enti ɔtoo no din Rehobot,
na ɔkaa sɛ: Afei deɛ AWURADE ama yɛn mu atrɛ, na yɛadɔre wɔ asase yi so.
Na ɔfirii hɔ kɔɔ Beer-seba.
Na AWURADE yii ne ho kyerɛɛ no anadwo no ara kaa sɛ: Mene w’agya Abraham Nyankopɔn, nsuro, na medi w’akyi. Mɛhyira wo, na m’akoa Abraham nti mɛma w’asefoɔ adɔre.
Na ɔsii afɔrebukyia wɔ hɔ, na ɔsɔree AWURADE, na ɔsii ne ntomadan wɔ hɔ. Na Isak nkoa tuu asubura wɔ hɔ.
Na Abimelek ne n’adamfo Ahusat ne ne safohene Pikol firi Gerar baa ne nkyɛn.
Na Isak ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Ɛdeɛn nti na moaba me nkyɛn yi? Sɛ motane me, na moapamo me afiri mo nkyɛn.
Na wɔse: Yɛahunu pefee sɛ AWURADE di w’akyi. Na yɛse: Ma ntam nna yɛne wo ntam. Na ma yɛne wo mpam,
sɛ worenyɛ yɛn bɔne biara; sɛdeɛ yɛanka woɔ, na yɛayɛ wo papa nko ara, na yɛagya wo kwan asomdwoeɛ mu no. Afei wone deɛ AWURADE ahyira no.
Na ɔtoo wɔn pono, na wɔdidi nomee.
Na wɔsɔree anɔpatutu kekaa ntam kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn ho, na Isak gyaa wɔn kwan, na wɔde asomdwoeɛ firi ne nkyɛn kɔe.
Na da no ara Isak nkoa ba bɛkaa no abura a wɔtuiɛ no ho asɛm sɛ: Yɛato nsuo.
Na ɔfrɛɛ no Siba. Enti kuro no din de Beer-seba de bɛsi nnɛ yi ara.
Na Esau dii mfirinhyia aduanan no, ɔwaree Hetini Beeri babaa Yudit ne Hetini Elon babaa Basmat.
Na wɔhyɛɛ Isak ne Rebeka awerɛhoɔ.
Na Isak bɔɔ akɔkoraa na n’ani so yɛɛ no kusukusu na ɔnhunu adeɛ yie no, ɔmaa wɔfrɛɛ ne ba panin Esau ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Me ba! Na ɔgyee so sɛ: Agya, menie.
Na ɔse: Mabɔ akora, na mennim me wuda.
Afei fa w’ahayɔdeɛ, w’agyan kotokuo ne w’agyan kɔ wiram kɔpɛ hanam brɛ me,
na noa akɔnnɔduane sɛdeɛ mepɛ brɛ me, na menni, na me nhyira wo ansa na mawu.
Ɛberɛ a Isak rekasa akyerɛ ne ba Esau no, Rebeka tee. Na Esau kɔɔ wiram sɛ ɔrekɔkum nam aba.
Na Rebeka ka kyerɛɛ ne ba Yakob sɛ: Hwɛ, metee sɛ w’agya rekasa kyerɛ wo nua Esau sɛ:
Kɔpɛ hanam brɛ me, na noa m’akɔnnɔduane, na menni, na menhyira wo AWURADE anim ansa na mawu.
Na afei, me ba, tie me nne, sɛdeɛ merehyɛ woɔ yi:
Kɔ mmoakuo no mu kɔkyere mmirekyie mma pa mmienu brɛ me, na memfa menyɛ akɔnnɔduane memma w’agya sɛdeɛ ɔpɛ;
na fa kɔma w’agya, na ɔnni, na ɔnhyira wo ansa na wawu.
Na Yakob ka kyerɛɛ ne na Rebeka sɛ: Hwɛ, me nua Esau ho wɔ nwi, na me deɛ, me ho yɛ toromtorom.
Ebia m’agya bɛka me ho ahwɛ, na mayɛ n’ani so sɛ ɔdaadaafoɔ, na mede nnome maba me so, na ɛnyɛ nhyira.
Ɛnna ne na ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wo nnome mmra me so, me ba, tie me nne ara, na kɔkyere wɔn brɛ me.
Na ɔkɔkyeree wɔn brɛɛ ne na, na ne na de yɛɛ akɔnnɔduane sɛdeɛ n’agya pɛ.
Na Rebeka faa ne ba panin Esau ntadeɛ fɛfɛ a ɛwɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ ɛdan mu de hyɛɛ ne ba kumaa Yakob.
Na ɔde mmirekyie mma no nwoma duraduraa ne nsa ne ne kɔn a ɛho yɛ toromtorom no ho.
Na ɔde akɔnnɔduane ne paanoo a wasiesie no hyɛɛ ne ba Yakob nsa.
Na ɔde kɔɔ n’agya nkyɛn, na ɔse: M’agya! Na ɔgyee so sɛ: Menie, ɛyɛ wo hwan a, me ba?
Na Yakob ka kyerɛɛ n’agya sɛ: Ɛyɛ me, w’abakan Esau. Mayɛ sɛdeɛ wokyerɛɛ me no. Mesrɛ wo, sɔre, tena ase, na di me hanam, na wo kra nhyira me.
Na Isak bisaa ne ba no sɛ: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wonyaa no ntɛm sɛɛ yi, me ba? Na ɔse: Ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn na ɔmaa me hyiaa yie.
Na Isak ka kyerɛɛ Yakob sɛ: Twe pini me, na menka wo menhwɛ, me ba, sɛ ampa ara sɛ me ba Esau ne wo anaasɛ ɛnyɛ ɔno a.
Na Yakob twe pinii n’agya Isak, na ɔde ne nsa kaa ne ho hwɛe, na ɔkaa sɛ: Ɛnne no yɛ Yakob nne, na nsa no deɛ, ɛyɛ Esau nsa.
Na wanhu no, ɛfiri sɛ na ne nsa ho wɔ nwi te sɛ ne nua Esau deɛ. Enti ɔhyiraa no.
Na ɔbisaa no sɛ: Ampa ara sɛ wone me ba Esau anaa? Na ɔse: Mene no.
Na ɔse: Fa pini me nkyɛn, na menni me ba hanam, na me kra nhyira wo. Na ɔde brɛɛ no, na ɔdii, na ɔde bobesa brɛɛ no, na ɔnomee.
Na n’agya Isak ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Twe pini bɛfe m’ano ɛ, me ba.
Na ɔtwe pinii kɔfee n’ano. Na Isak huaa n’atadeɛ mu hwa hwɛe, na ɔhyiraa no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Hwɛ, me ba ho hwa
te sɛ afuo a AWURADE ahyira soɔ mu hwa.
Onyankopɔn mma wo ɔsoro bosuo
ne asase mu sradeɛ bi,
ne aburoo ne nsa pii.
Aman nsom wo,
na nkurɔfoɔ nkoto wo.
Yɛ wo nuanom so wura,
na wo na mma nkoto wo.
Wɔadome wɔn a wɔdome woɔ,
na wɔahyira wɔn a wɔhyira woɔ.

verse.content: Na Isak wiee Yakob hyira na Yakob firii n’agya nkyɛn firii adi ara pɛ na ne nua Esau firi n’ahayɔ baeɛ.
Na ɔno nso bɛnoaa akɔnnɔduane de brɛɛ n’agya ka kyerɛɛ n’agya sɛ: M’agya sɔre ɛ, na di wo ba hanam, na wo kra nhyira me!
Na n’agya Isak see no sɛ: Ɛyɛ wo hwan a? Na ɔse: Ɛyɛ me, wo ba, w’abakan Esau.
Na Isak de ahopopoɔ kɛseɛ pa ara kaa sɛ: Hwan mpo ne deɛ ɔkɔyɛɛ ha de brɛɛ me, na medii ne nyinaa na mehyiraa no ansa na woreba yi? Nso ɔbɛyɛ deɛ wɔahyira no.
Esau tee n’agya nsɛm no, ɔde su kɛseɛ ne awerɛhoɔ pii teaa mu denden ka kyerɛɛ n’agya sɛ: M’agya, hyira me nso bi.
Na ɔse: Wo nua de nnaadaa aba abɛgye wo nhyira.
Na ɔse: Ne din nne Yakob anaa? Mprenu ni na watwintwane m’anan mu. Wafa me panin, na hwɛ, afei nso wagye me nhyira. Na ɔse: Woamfa nhyira bi ansie me?
Na Isak bua see Esau sɛ: Hwɛ, mede no mayɛ wo so wura, na mede ne nuanom nyinaa mayɛ ne nkoa. Na mede aburoo ne nsa mawowa no. Na afei wo deɛ, ɛdeɛn na menyɛ woɔ, me ba?
Na Esau ka kyerɛɛ n’agya sɛ: M’agya, nhyira baako pɛ na wowɔ? Hyira me nso, m’agya. Na Esau maa ne nne so sui.
Na n’agya Isak bua see no sɛ:

block_quote.content: Hwɛ, asase a sradeɛ nni mu
ne deɛ ɔsoro bosuo ngu soɔ so na wobɛtena.
Wo nkrantɛ so na wonam bɛtena aseɛ,
na wobɛsom wo nua.
Nanso ɛbɛba sɛ wobɔ mmɔden kentene wo ho a,
wobɛyi ne kɔnnua afiri wo kɔn so.

verse.content: Na Esau tanee Yakob wɔ nhyira a n’agya de hyiraa no no nti. Na Esau kaa no n’akoma mu sɛ: Nna a wɔde bɛsu m’agya no reyɛ abɛn, na merebɛkum me nua Yakob.
Na wɔkɔkaa ne ba panin Esau nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Rebeka. Na ɔsoma maa wɔkɔfrɛɛ ne ba kumaa Yakob, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ, wo nua Esau rekyekyere ne werɛ sɛ ɔrebɛku wo.
Afei, me ba, tie me nne, na sɔre dwane kɔ me nua Laban nkyɛn wɔ Haran,
na tena ne nkyɛn nna tiaa kɔsi sɛ wo nua anibereɛ no bɛfiri ne mu,
kɔsi sɛ wo nua abufuo bɛdane afiri wo soɔ, na ne werɛ afiri deɛ woyɛɛ no no, ansa na masoma ama wɔabɛfa wo wɔ hɔ aba. Na adɛn nti koraa na ɛsɛ sɛ mehwere mo baanu da koro?
Na Rebeka ka kyerɛɛ Isak sɛ: Het mmammaa nti m’asetena afono me. Sɛ Yakob kɔware yerɛ Het mmammaa mu, sɛ yeinom a wɔwɔ ɛha yi a, na me mmerɛ ngui, na mete ase reyɛ deɛn bio?
Na Isak frɛɛ Yakob, na ɔhyiraa no hyɛɛ no sɛ: Nware ɛyerɛ wɔ Kanaan mmammaa mu.
Sɔre kɔ Mesopotamia kɔ wo na n’agya Betuel fie, na kɔware wɔ wo na nua Laban mmammaa mu bi.
Na Onyankopɔn Tweaduampɔn nhyira wo, na ɔmma wo nnɔ, na ɔmma wo nyɛ bebree, na woayɛ aman asafo;
na ɔmfa Abraham nhyira nhyira wo, wo ne w’asefoɔ a wɔka wo ho, na woanya asase a woyɛ so hɔhoɔ a Onyankopɔn de ama Abraham yi.
Na Isak gyaa Yakob kwan, na ɔkɔɔ Mesopotamia wɔ Aramni Betuel ba Laban a ɔyɛ Yakob ne Esau wɔn na Rebeka nuabarima no nkyɛn.
Na Esau hunuu sɛ Isak ahyira Yakob, ama wagya no kwan sɛ ɔnkɔ Mesopotamia nkɔware yerɛ wɔ hɔ. Afei ɔhunuu bio sɛ ɔhyiraa no hyɛɛ no sɛ: Nware Kanaan mmammaa mu yerɛ,
na Yakob tiee n’agya ne ne na, na ɔkɔɔ Mesopotamia.
Na Esau hunuu sɛ Kanaan mmammaa nyɛ wɔ n’agya Isak ani soɔ no,
ɔsii mu kɔɔ Ismael nkyɛn kɔwaree Abraham ba Ismael babaa, Nebaiot nuabaa Mahalat kaa ne yerenom no ho.
Na Yakob firi Beer-seba sii mu kɔɔ Haran.
Na ɔduruu baabi no ɔsoɛɛ hɔ anadwo no, ɛfiri sɛ na owia akɔtɔ. Na ɔfaa hɔ aboɔ no mu baako de yɛɛ sumiiɛ, na ɔdaa hɔ.
Na ɔsoo daeɛ, na hwɛ, na atwedeɛ bi si fam a atifi pem soro, na hwɛ, Nyankopɔn abɔfoɔ redi so aforosiane.
Na hwɛ, AWURADE gyina atifi, na ɔse: Mene AWURADE, w’agya Abraham Nyankopɔn ne Isak Nyankopɔn; asase a woda soɔ yi mede bɛma wo ne w’asefoɔ.
Na w’asefoɔ bɛyɛ sɛ asase so mfuturo, na woatrɛ akɔ atɔeɛ ne apueeɛ, atifi fam ne anafoɔ fam. Na wo ne w’asefoɔ mu na wɔbɛhyira wiase mmusuakuo nyinaa.
Na hwɛ, mɛdi w’akyi, na mahwɛ wo so baabiara a wobɛkorɔ, na mama woasane aba asase yi so. Na merennya wo de bɛkɔ akɔsi sɛ mɛma deɛ maka makyerɛ woɔ yi aba mu.
Na Yakob nyane firii ne nna mu no, ɔkaa sɛ: Ampa ara, AWURADE wɔ ha yi, nanso me deɛ, manhunu.
Na ɔsuroe, na ɔse: Ɛha yi yɛ hu ampa. Ɛha nyɛ baabiara sɛ Nyankopɔn fie, na ɛha ne ɔsoro aboboano.
